trans-unit.source: '\&' escapes the ampersand character

trans-unit.source: '\>' escapes the more than character

trans-unit.source: '\<' escapes the less than character

trans-unit.source: '\'' escapes the apostrophe character

trans-unit.source: '\(' escapes the left parenthesis character

trans-unit.source: '\)' escapes the right parenthesis character
trans-unit.target: ' \) '转义右括号字符

trans-unit.source: '\*' escapes the star character
trans-unit.target: ' \* '转义为星号

trans-unit.source: '\;' escapes the semicolon character

trans-unit.source: '\ooo', where ooo is an octal number, represents the ascii character with the specified value. For example, \011 is the tab character.
trans-unit.target: ' \ooo '，其中 ooo 是八进制数字，表示具有指定值的ascii字符。例如， \011 是制表符。

trans-unit.source: '\?' escapes the question mark character
trans-unit.target: ' \? '逃脱问号字符

trans-unit.source: '\Uxxxxxxxx', where xxxxxxxx is a hexadecimal number, represents the 32-bit Unicode character with the specified value. For example, \U9 is the tab character.
trans-unit.target: ' \Uxxxxxxxx '，其中 xxxxxxxx 是一个十六进制数字，表示具有指定值的32位Unicode字符。例如， \U9 是制表符。

trans-unit.source: '\Xxx', where xx is a hexadecimal number, represents a byte of data with the specified value. If you are using a multibyte encoding, this can be used to enter invalid strings. Only use this if you know what you are doing.
trans-unit.target: ' \Xxx '，其中 xx 是十六进制数，表示具有指定值的数据字节。如果您使用的是多字节编码，则可用于输入无效的字符串。仅当您知道自己在做什么时才使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: '\[' escapes the left bracket character
trans-unit.target: ' \[ '转义为左括号

trans-unit.source: '\\' escapes the backslash character
trans-unit.target: ' \\ '转义反斜杠字符

trans-unit.source: '\]' escapes the right bracket character
trans-unit.target: ' \] '转义右括号字符

trans-unit.source: '\^' escapes the circumflex character
trans-unit.target: ' \^ '转义符

trans-unit.source: '\a' represents the alert character
trans-unit.target: ' \a '表示警报字符

trans-unit.source: '\b' represents the backspace character
trans-unit.target: ' \b '表示退格字符

trans-unit.source: '\cx', where x is a letter of the alphabet, represents the control sequence generated by pressing the control key and the specified letter. For example, \ci is the tab character
trans-unit.target: ' \cx '，其中 x 是字母，表示通过按控制键和指定字母生成的控制序列。例如， \ci 是制表符

trans-unit.source: '\e' represents the escape character
trans-unit.target: ' \e '代表转义字符

trans-unit.source: '\f' represents the form feed character
trans-unit.target: ' \f '代表换页字符

trans-unit.source: '\n' represents a newline character
trans-unit.target: ' \n '代表换行符

trans-unit.source: '\r' represents the carriage return character
trans-unit.target: ' \r '代表回车符

trans-unit.source: '\t' represents the tab character
trans-unit.target: ' \t '代表制表符

trans-unit.source: '\uxxxx', where xxxx is a hexadecimal number, represents the 16-bit Unicode character with the specified value. For example, \u9 is the tab character.
trans-unit.target: ' \uxxxx '，其中 xxxx 是十六进制数字，表示具有指定值的16位Unicode字符。例如， \u9 是制表符。

trans-unit.source: '\v' represents the vertical tab character
trans-unit.target: ' \v '代表垂直制表符

trans-unit.source: '\xxx', where xx is a hexadecimal number, represents the ascii character with the specified value. For example, \x9 is the tab character.
trans-unit.target: ' \xxx '，其中 xx 是十六进制数字，表示具有指定值的ascii字符。例如， \x9 是制表符。

trans-unit.target: ' \| '转义竖线字符

trans-unit.source: 123 means that the command was not executed because the command name contained invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: 123表示由于命令名称包含无效字符,所以命令没有被执行。

trans-unit.source: 124 means that the command was not executed because none of the wildcards in the command produced any matches.
trans-unit.target: 124表示命令没有被执行,因为命令中的通配符都没有产生任何匹配。

trans-unit.source: 125 means that while an executable with the specified name was located, the operating system could not actually execute the command.
trans-unit.target: 125表示虽然找到了指定名称的可执行文件,但操作系统无法实际执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: 126 means that while a file with the specified name was located, it was not executable.
trans-unit.target: 126表示虽然找到了指定名称的文件,但不能执行。

trans-unit.source: 127 means that no function, builtin or command with the given name could be located.
trans-unit.target: 127表示无法找到指定名称的函数、内建函数或命令。

Universal variables are stored in the file .config/fish/fish_variables. Do not edit this file directly, as your edits may be overwritten. Edit the variables through fish scripts or by using fish interactively instead.

Universal variables are stored in the file .config/fish/fishd.MACHINE_ID, where MACHINE_ID is typically your MAC address. Do not edit this file directly, as your edits may be overwritten. Edit them through fish scripts or by using fish interactively instead.
trans-unit.target: 通用变量存储在文件 .config/fish/fishd.MACHINE_ID 中，其中MACHINE_ID通常是您的MAC地址。不要直接编辑此文件，因为您的编辑可能会被覆盖。通过鱼脚本或交互使用鱼来编辑它们。

← (or Control-B) and → (or Control-F) move the cursor left or right by one character. If the cursor is already at the end of the line, and an autosuggestion is available, the → key and the Control-F combination accept the suggestion.
trans-unit.target: ←（或Control - B）和→（或Control - F）向左或向右移动光标一个字符。如果光标已经在该行的末尾，并且可以使用自动提示，则→键和Control - F组合接受建议。

trans-unit.source: ← and → extend the selection backward/forward by one character.
trans-unit.target: ←和→将选择向后/向前扩展一个字符。

trans-unit.source: ↑ and ↓ (or Control-P and Control-N for emacs aficionados) search the command history for the previous/next command containing the string that was specified on the commandline before the search was started. If the commandline was empty when the search started, all commands match. See the history section for more information on history searching.
trans-unit.target: ↑和↓（对于emacs爱好者，则为Control - P和Control - N）在命令历史记录中搜索上一个/下一个命令，其中包含在开始搜索之前在命令行上指定的字符串。如果搜索开始时命令行为空，则所有命令均匹配。有关历史记录搜索的更多信息，请参见历史记录部分。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero) moves the cursor to beginning of line (remaining in command mode).
trans-unit.target: 0（零）将光标移动到行首（保留在命令模式下）。

trans-unit.source: Backspace moves the cursor left.
trans-unit.target: Backspace向左移动光标。

trans-unit.source: Backspace removes one character to the left.
trans-unit.target: 退格键将左侧删除一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Delete and Backspace removes one character forwards or backwards respectively.
trans-unit.target: Delete和Backspace分别向前或向后删除一个字符。

trans-unit.source: End or Control-E moves to the end of line. If the cursor is already at the end of the line, and an autosuggestion is available, End or Control-E accepts the autosuggestion.
trans-unit.target: 端或控制 - ë移动到行的结尾。如果光标已经在该行的末尾，以及自我暗示是可用的，结束或控制 - Ë接受自我暗示。

trans-unit.source: Escape and Control-C enter command mode.
trans-unit.target: Escape和Control - C进入命令模式。

trans-unit.source: Escape enters command mode.
trans-unit.target: 转义进入命令模式。

trans-unit.source: Home or Control-A moves the cursor to the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: Home或Control - A将光标移动到行首。

trans-unit.source: Tabcompletes the current token. Shift- Tab completes the current token and starts the pager's search mode.
trans-unit.target: Tab键完成当前令牌。移 - Tab键完成当前的令牌并启动寻呼机的搜索模式。

trans-unit.source: [ and ] search the command history for the previous/next token containing the token under the cursor before the search was started. See the history section for more information on history searching.
trans-unit.target: [和]在开始搜索之前，在命令历史记录中搜索包含光标下的令牌的上一个/下一个令牌。有关历史记录搜索的更多信息，请参见历史记录部分。

trans-unit.source: a enters insert mode after the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: a在当前光标位置之后进入插入模式。

trans-unit.source: argument a parameter given to a command
trans-unit.target: 参数的参数给定的命令

trans-unit.source: b and w extend the selection backward/forward by one word.
trans-unit.target: b和w将选择向后/向前扩展一个单词。

trans-unit.source: builtin a command that is implemented in the shell. Builtins are commands that are so closely tied to the shell that it is impossible to implement them as external commands.
trans-unit.target: 内置在外壳中实现的命令。内置命令是与外壳紧密相关的命令，因此无法将其实现为外部命令。

trans-unit.source: command a program that the shell can run.
trans-unit.target: 命令外壳程序可以运行的程序。

trans-unit.source: d and x move the selection to the killring and enter command mode.
trans-unit.target: d和x将选择移至杀戮并进入命令模式。

trans-unit.source: dd deletes the current line and moves it to the killring.
trans-unit.target: d d删除当前行并将其移至killring。

trans-unit.source: function a block of commands that can be called as if they were a single command. By using functions, it is possible to string together multiple smaller commands into one more advanced command.
trans-unit.target: 函数功能块可以像单个命令一样被调用。通过使用功能，可以将多个较小的命令组合成一个更高级的命令。

trans-unit.source: h moves the cursor left.
trans-unit.target: h将光标向左移动。

trans-unit.source: i enters insert mode at the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 我在当前光标位置进入插入模式。

trans-unit.source: job a running pipeline or command
trans-unit.target: 作业正在运行的管道或命令

trans-unit.source: l moves the cursor right.
trans-unit.target: l向右移动光标。

trans-unit.source: p pastes text from the killring.
trans-unit.target: p从killring粘贴文本。

trans-unit.source: pipeline a set of commands stringed together so that the output of one command is the input of the next command
trans-unit.target: 管道将一组命令串在一起，以便一个命令的输出是下一个命令的输入

trans-unit.source: redirection an operation that changes one of the input/output streams associated with a job
trans-unit.target: 重定向更改与作业关联的输入/输出流之一的操作

trans-unit.source: switch a special flag sent as an argument to a command that will alter the behavior of the command. A switch almost always begins with one or two hyphens.
trans-unit.target: 将作为参数发送的特殊标志切换到命令，这将改变命令的行为。切换几乎总是以一个或两个连字符开头。

trans-unit.source: u search history backwards.
trans-unit.target: 你向后搜索历史。

trans-unit.source: v enters visual mode at the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: v在当前光标位置进入可视模式。

trans-unit.source: ! EXPRESSION returns true if EXPRESSION is false, and false if EXPRESSION is true.
trans-unit.target: ! EXPRESSION 如果返回true EXPRESSION 是假的，假如果 EXPRESSION 为true。

trans-unit.source: #-max means that flags matching the regex "^--?\d+$" are valid. When seen they are assigned to the variable _flag_max. This allows any valid positive or negative integer to be specified by prefixing it with a single "-". Many commands support this idiom. For example head -3 /a/file to emit only the first three lines of /a/file.
trans-unit.target: #-max 表示与正则表达式“ ^-？\ d + $”匹配的标志有效。看到它们时，它们被分配给变量 _flag_max 。这允许通过使用单个“-”作为前缀来指定任何有效的正整数或负整数。许多命令都支持该惯用法。例如 head -3 /a/file 仅发出/ a / file的前三行。

trans-unit.source: #-max means that flags matching the regex "^--?d+$" are valid. When seen they are assigned to the variable _flag_max. This allows any valid positive or negative integer to be specified by prefixing it with a single "-". Many commands support this idiom. For example head -3 /a/file to emit only the first three lines of /a/file.
$PATH is an environment variable containing the directories in which fish searches for commands. Unlike other shells, $PATH is a list, not a colon-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: $PATH 是一个环境变量，其中包含 fish 在其中搜索命令的目录。与其他shell不同，$ PATH是list，而不是用冒号分隔的字符串。

trans-unit.source: $PATH is an environment variable containing the directories that fish searches for commands. Unlike other shells, $PATH is a list, not a colon-delimited string.
$__fish_config_dir/conf.d (by default, ~/.config/fish/conf.d/)
trans-unit.target: $__fish_config_dir/conf.d （默认为 ~/.config/fish/conf.d/ ）

trans-unit.source: $__fish_git_prompt_char_cleanstate (✔)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_dirtystate (*, ✚)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_invalidstate (#, ✖)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_stagedstate (+, ●)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_stashstate ($, ⚑)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_stateseparator (' ', |)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_untrackedfiles (%, …)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_upstream_ahead (>, ↑)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_upstream_behind (<, ↓)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_upstream_diverged (<>)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_upstream_equal (=)
$__fish_git_prompt_char_upstream_prefix ('')
$__fish_git_prompt_color ('')
$__fish_git_prompt_color_branch (green)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_branch_detached (red)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_dirtystate (red with showcolorhints, same as color_flags otherwise)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_flags (--bold blue)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_stagedstate (green with showcolorhints, color_flags otherwise)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_stashstate (same as color_flags)
$__fish_git_prompt_color_untrackedfiles (same as color_flags)
$__fish_git_prompt_describe_style can be set to one of the following styles to describe the current HEAD:
$__fish_git_prompt_shorten_branch_len can be set to the number of characters that the branch name will be shortened to.

$__fish_git_prompt_show_informative_status or the git option bash.showInformativeStatus can be set to enable the "informative" display, which will show a large amount of information - the number of untracked files, dirty files, unpushed/unpulled commits, and more. In large repositories, this can take a lot of time, so it you may wish to disable it in these repositories with git config --local bash.showInformativeStatus false.
$__fish_git_prompt_showcolorhints can be set to enable coloring for the branch name and status symbols.
$__fish_git_prompt_showdirtystate or the git option bash.showDirtyState can be set to show if the repository is "dirty", i.e. has uncommitted changes.
$__fish_git_prompt_showstashstate can be set to display the state of the stash.
$__fish_git_prompt_showuntrackedfiles or the git option bash.showUntrackedFiles can be set to show if the repository has untracked files (that aren't ignored).
$__fish_git_prompt_showupstream can be set to a list of values to determine how changes between HEAD and upstream are shown:
$__fish_sysconf_dir/conf.d (by default, /etc/fish/conf.d/)
$__fish_sysconf_dir/conf.d (by default, /etc/fish/conf.d)
trans-unit.target: $__fish_sysconf_dir/conf.d （默认为 /etc/fish/conf.d ）

trans-unit.source: $fish_color_hg_clean, $fish_color_hg_modified and $fish_color_hg_dirty are colors used when the repository has the respective status.
$fish_prompt_hg_status_added, default '✚'
$fish_prompt_hg_status_copied, default '⇒'
$fish_prompt_hg_status_deleted, default '✖'
$fish_prompt_hg_status_modified, default '*'
$fish_prompt_hg_status_unmerged, default '!'
$fish_prompt_hg_status_untracked, default '?'
$n is a reference from the replacement expression to a group in the match expression.
trans-unit.target: $n 是从替换表达式到匹配表达式中组的引用。

trans-unit.source: %% signifies a literal "%".
trans-unit.target: %% 表示文字“％”。

trans-unit.source: % for modulo.
trans-unit.target: % 为模数。

trans-unit.source: %b: As a string, interpreting backslash escapes, except that octal escapes are of the form 0 or 0ooo.
%b: As a string, interpreting backslash escapes, except that octal escapes are of the form \0 or \0ooo.
trans-unit.target: %b ：作为字符串，解释反斜杠转义符，但八进制转义符的格式为\ 0或\ 0ooo。

trans-unit.source: %d: Argument will be used as decimal integer (signed or unsigned)
trans-unit.target: %d ：参数将用作十进制整数（有符号或无符号）

trans-unit.source: %e or %E: A floating-point number in scientific (XXXeYY) notation
trans-unit.target: %e 或 %E ：科学（XXXeYY）表示形式的浮点数

trans-unit.source: %f, %g or %G: A floating-point number
trans-unit.target: %f ， %g 或 %G ：浮点数

trans-unit.source: %i: Argument will be used as a signed integer
trans-unit.target: %i ：参数将用作有符号整数

trans-unit.source: %o: An octal unsigned integer
trans-unit.target: %o ：八进制无符号整数

trans-unit.source: %s: A string
trans-unit.target: %s ：一个字符串

trans-unit.source: %u: An unsigned decimal integer
trans-unit.target: %u ：无符号十进制整数

trans-unit.source: %x or %X: An unsigned hexadecimal integer
trans-unit.target: %x 或 %X ：无符号十六进制整数

trans-unit.source: > grep --ignore-case
( EXPRESSION ) returns the value of EXPRESSION.
trans-unit.target: ( EXPRESSION ) 返回的值 EXPRESSION 。

trans-unit.source: (...) is a capturing group
trans-unit.target: (...) 是一个捕获小组

trans-unit.source: ( and ) for grouping.
trans-unit.target: ( 和 ) 进行分组。

trans-unit.source: ( and ) for grouping. (These need to be quoted or escaped because () denotes a command substitution.)
(?:...) is a non-capturing group
trans-unit.target: (?:...) 是一个非捕获组

trans-unit.source: ** matches any files and directories in the current directory and all of its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: ** 匹配当前目录及其所有子目录中的所有文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: ** matches any string of characters. This includes matching an empty string. The matched string may include the / character; that is, it recurses into subdirectories. Note that augmenting this wildcard with other strings will not match files in the current working directory ($PWD) if you separate the strings with a slash ("/"). This is unlike other shells such as zsh. For example, **\/*.fish in zsh will match .fish files in the PWD but in fish will only match such files in a subdirectory. In fish you should type **.fish to match files in the PWD as well as subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: ** 匹配任何字符串。这包括匹配一个空字符串。匹配的字符串可以包含 / 字符；也就是说，它递归到子目录中。请注意，如果使用斜杠（“ /”）分隔字符串，则使用其他字符串扩展此通配符将不匹配当前工作目录（ $PWD ）中的文件。这与zsh等其他shell不同。例如，zsh中的 **\/*.fish .fish 将与PWD 中的.fish文件匹配，但fish中的子目录中仅与此类文件匹配。在fish中，您应该键入 **.fish 以匹配PWD以及子目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: * can match any string of characters not containing '/'. This includes matching an empty string.
trans-unit.target: * 可以匹配任何不包含“ /”的字符串。这包括匹配一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: * for multiplication, / for division.
trans-unit.target: * 用于乘法， / 用于除法。

trans-unit.source: * or x for multiplication, / for division. (Note that * is the glob character and needs to be quoted or escaped, x needs to be followed by whitespace or it looks like 0x hexadecimal notation.)
* refers to 0 or more repetitions of the previous expression
trans-unit.target: * 表示上一个表达式的0个或多个重复

trans-unit.source: + 1 or more
trans-unit.target: + 1或更多

trans-unit.source: + for addition and - for subtraction.
trans-unit.target: + 用于加法， - 用于减法。

trans-unit.source: -<number>-n <number> or --max=<number> limits the matched history items to the first "n" matching entries. This is only valid for history search.
trans-unit.target: -<number> -n <number> 或 --max=<number> 将匹配的历史记录项限制为前“ n”个匹配条目。这仅对 history search 有效。

trans-unit.source: --ansi colorizes the output using ANSI escape sequences, appropriate for the current $TERM, using the colors defined in the environment (such as $fish_color_command).
trans-unit.target: --ansi colorizes使用ANSI转义序列的输出，适合于当前$ TERM，使用环境中的（如所定义的颜色 $fish_color_command ）。

trans-unit.source: --dump-parse-tree dumps information about the parsed statements to stderr. This is likely to be of interest only to people working on the fish source code.
trans-unit.target: --dump-parse-tree 将有关已解析语句的信息转储到stderr。这可能仅对从事鱼类源代码工作的人员感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: --html outputs HTML, which supports syntax highlighting if the appropriate CSS is defined. The CSS class names are the same as the variable names, such as fish_color_command.
trans-unit.target: --html 输出HTML，如果定义了适当的CSS，则HTML支持语法突出显示。CSS类名称与变量名称相同，例如 fish_color_command 。

trans-unit.source: --long-only means the option spec being defined will only allow the long flag name to be used. The short flag name must still be defined (i.e., --short must be specified) but it cannot be used when parsing args using this option spec.
trans-unit.target: --long-only 表示所定义的选项规范仅允许使用长标志名称。仍然必须定义短标志名称（即，必须指定 --short ），但是在使用此选项规范解析args时不能使用它。

trans-unit.source: --multiple-vals means the option being defined requires a value each time it is seen. Each instance is stored. This means the resulting flag variable created by argparse will have one element for each instance of this option in the args.
trans-unit.target: --multiple-vals 意味着每次看到定义的选项时都需要一个值。每个实例都存储。这意味着由 argparse 创建的标志变量将在args中对该选项的每个实例具有一个元素。

trans-unit.source: --path causes the specified variable to be treated as a path variable, meaning it will automatically be split on colons, and joined using colons when quoted (echo "$PATH") or exported.

--preset and --user specify if bind should operate on user or preset bindings. User bindings take precedence over preset bindings when fish looks up mappings. By default, all bind invocations work on the "user" level except for listing, which will show both levels. All invocations except for inserting new bindings can operate on both levels at the same time. --preset should only be used in full binding sets (like when working on fish_vi_key_bindings).
trans-unit.target: --preset 和 --user 指定绑定是否应对用户或预设绑定进行操作。在Fish查找映射时，用户绑定优先于预设绑定。默认情况下，所有 bind 调用均在“用户”级别上起作用，除了列表外，它将显示两个级别。除了插入新绑定之外，所有调用都可以同时在两个级别上进行。 --preset 仅应在完整的绑定集中使用（例如在 fish_vi_key_bindings 上工作时）。

trans-unit.source: --print-debug-categories outputs the list of debug categories, and then exits.
--print-rusage-self when fish exits, output stats from getrusage
--style=regex escapes an input string for literal matching within a regex expression. The string is first converted to UTF-8 before being encoded.
trans-unit.target: --style=regex 转义用于在regex表达式内进行文字匹配的输入字符串。字符串在编码之前先转换为UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: --style=url ensures the string can be used as a URL by hex encoding any character which is not legal in a URL. The string is first converted to UTF-8 before being encoded.
trans-unit.target: --style=url 可通过十六进制编码URL中不合法的任何字符来确保该字符串可用作URL。字符串在编码之前先转换为UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: --style=var ensures the string can be used as a variable name by hex encoding any non-alphanumeric characters. The string is first converted to UTF-8 before being encoded.
trans-unit.target: --style=var 通过十六进制编码任何非字母数字字符来确保该字符串可用作变量名。字符串在编码之前先转换为UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: --unpath causes the specified variable to not be treated as a path variable. Variables with a name ending in "PATH" are automatically path variables, so this can be used to treat such a variable normally.
-A and --authoritative no longer do anything and are silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: -A 和 --authoritative 不再执行任何操作，并且被忽略。

trans-unit.source: -C or --case-sensitive does a case-sensitive search. The default is case-insensitive. Note that prior to fish 2.4.0 the default was case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: -C 或 --case-sensitive 区分大小写。默认值不区分大小写。请注意，在fish 2.4.0之前，默认值区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: -C or --cursor set or get the current cursor position, not the contents of the buffer. If no argument is given, the current cursor position is printed, otherwise the argument is interpreted as the new cursor position.
trans-unit.target: -C 或 --cursor 设置或获取当前光标位置，而不是缓冲区的内容。如果未提供任何参数，则打印当前光标位置，否则将参数解释为新的光标位置。

trans-unit.source: -C or --do-complete with no argument makes complete try to find all possible completions for the current command line buffer. If the shell is not in interactive mode, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: -C 或 --do-complete （不带参数）将完全尝试查找当前命令行缓冲区的所有可能补全。如果外壳程序不在交互模式下，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: -C or --init-command=COMMANDS evaluate the specified commands after reading the configuration, before running the command specified by -c or reading interactive input
trans-unit.target: -C 或 --init-command=COMMANDS 在读取配置之后，运行 -c 指定的命令或读取交互式输入之前评估指定的命令

trans-unit.source: -CSTRING or --do-complete=STRING makes complete try to find all possible completions for the specified string.
trans-unit.target: -CSTRING 或 --do-complete=STRING 会完全尝试查找指定字符串的所有可能补全。

trans-unit.source: -D or --debug-stack-frames=DEBUG_LEVEL specify how many stack frames to display when debug messages are written. The default is zero. A value of 3 or 4 is usually sufficient to gain insight into how a given debug call was reached but you can specify a value up to 128.
trans-unit.target: -D 或 --debug-stack-frames=DEBUG_LEVEL 指定在写入调试消息时要显示多少个堆栈帧。默认值为零。通常，值为3或4足以了解如何达到给定的调试调用，但是您可以指定最大为128的值。

trans-unit.source: -D or --details reports the path name where each function is defined or could be autoloaded, stdin if the function was defined interactively or on the command line or by reading stdin, - if the function was created via source, and n/a if the function isn't available. (Functions created via alias will return -, because alias uses source internally.) If the --verbose option is also specified then five lines are written:

-D or --details reports the path name where each function is defined or could be autoloaded, stdin if the function was defined interactively or on the command line or by reading stdin, and n/a if the function isn't available. If the --verbose option is also specified then five lines are written:
trans-unit.target: -D 或 --details 报告，其中每个函数定义或可以自动加载，路径名 stdin ，如果函数交互或在命令行上或通过读取标准输入限定，并且 n/a 如果功能不可用。如果还指定了 --verbose 选项，则会写入五行：

trans-unit.source: -E, Disable interpretation of backslash escapes (default)
trans-unit.target: -E ，禁用反斜杠转义的解释（默认）

trans-unit.source: -F or --fifo will cause psub to use a named pipe rather than a file. You should only use this if the command produces no more than 8 KiB of output. The limit on the amount of data a FIFO can buffer varies with the OS but is typically 8 KiB, 16 KiB or 64 KiB. If you use this option and the command on the left of the psub pipeline produces more output a deadlock is likely to occur.
trans-unit.target: -F 或 --fifo 将导致psub使用命名管道而不是文件。仅当命令产生的输出不超过8 KiB时，才应使用此选项。FIFO可以缓冲的数据量限制因操作系统而异，但通常为8 KiB，16 KiB或64 KiB。如果使用此选项，并且psub管道左侧的命令会产生更多输出，则可能会发生死锁。

trans-unit.source: -F or --force-files says that the options specified by this completion may be followed by a filename, even if another applicable complete specified --no-files.
-G FILE returns true if FILE exists and has the same group ID as the current user.
trans-unit.target: -G FILE 如果 FILE 存在并且具有与当前用户相同的组ID，则-G FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -H or --handlers will show all event handlers.
trans-unit.target: -H 或 --handlers 将显示所有事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -H or --hard sets hard resource limit
trans-unit.target: -H 或 --hard 设置硬资源限制

trans-unit.source: -K or --key-names Display a list of available key names. Specifying -a or --all includes keys that don't have a known mapping
trans-unit.target: -K 或 --key-names 显示可用键名的列表。指定 -a 或 --all 包含没有已知映射的键

trans-unit.source: -L FILE returns true if FILE is a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: -L FILE 如果 FILE 是符号链接，则-L FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -L or --line print the line that the cursor is on, with the topmost line starting at 1
trans-unit.target: -L 或 --line 打印光标所在的行，最上面的行从1开始

trans-unit.source: -L or --line reads each line into successive variables, and stops after each variable has been filled. This cannot be combined with the --delimiter option.
trans-unit.target: -L 或 --line 将每一行读入连续的变量，并在填充每个变量后停止。不能与 --delimiter 选项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: -L or --list-modes Display a list of defined bind modes
trans-unit.target: -L 或 --list-modes 显示定义的绑定模式的列表

trans-unit.source: -L or --long do not abbreviate long values when printing set variables
trans-unit.target: -L 或 --long 在打印设置变量时不缩写long值

trans-unit.source: -L, Output the logical working directory, without resolving symlinks (default behavior).
trans-unit.target: -L ，输出逻辑工作目录，而不解析符号链接（默认行为）。

trans-unit.source: -M MODE or --mode MODE Specify a bind mode that the bind is used in. Defaults to "default"
trans-unit.target: -M MODE 或 --mode MODE 指定绑定使用的绑定模式。默认为“默认”

trans-unit.source: -N or --min-args is followed by an integer that defines the minimum number of acceptable non-option arguments. The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: -N 或 --min-args 后跟一个整数，该整数定义可接受的非选项参数的最小数量。默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: -O FILE returns true if FILE exists and is owned by the current user.
trans-unit.target: -O FILE 如果 FILE 存在并且由当前用户拥有，则-O FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -P PROMPT_STR or --prompt-str=PROMPT_STR uses the string as the prompt for the interactive mode. It is equivalent to echo PROMPT_STR and is provided solely to avoid the need to frame the prompt as a command. All special characters in the string are automatically escaped before being passed to the echo command.
trans-unit.target: -P PROMPT_STR 或--prompt --prompt-str=PROMPT_STR 使用字符串作为交互模式的提示。它等效于 echo PROMPT_STR ，仅提供它是为了避免将提示构造为命令。字符串中的所有特殊字符在传递给 echo 命令之前都会自动转义。

trans-unit.source: -P or --force-path returns the name of the disk file that would be executed, or nothing if no file with the specified name could be found in the $PATH.
trans-unit.target: -P 或 --force-path 返回将要执行的磁盘文件的名称，如果在 $PATH 找不到具有指定名称的文件，则不返回任何名称。

trans-unit.source: -P or --force-path returns the path to the executable file NAME, presuming NAME is found in $PATH, or nothing otherwise. --force-path explicitly resolves only the path to executable files in $PATH, regardless of whether $NAME is shadowed by a function or builtin with the same name.
-P or --paging-mode evaluates to true if the commandline is showing pager contents, such as tab completions
trans-unit.target: -P 如果命令行显示分页器内容（例如制表符 --paging-mode -P或--paging-mode的计算结果为true

trans-unit.source: -P or --private enables private mode, so fish will not access old or store new history.
-P, Output the physical working directory, with symlinks resolved.
trans-unit.target: -P ，输出物理工作目录，并解析符号链接。

trans-unit.source: -R RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD or --right-prompt=RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD uses the output of the shell command RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD as the right prompt for the interactive mode. There is no default right prompt command.
trans-unit.target: -R RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD 或--right --right-prompt=RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD 使用外壳程序命令 RIGHT_PROMPT_CMD 的输出作为交互模式的正确提示。没有默认的右提示命令。

trans-unit.source: -R or --reverse causes the history search results to be ordered oldest to newest. Which is the order used by most shells. The default is newest to oldest.
trans-unit.target: -R 或 --reverse 使历史搜索结果从最旧到最新排序。大多数壳使用的顺序。默认值为最新到最旧。

trans-unit.source: -S FILE returns true if FILE is a socket.
trans-unit.target: -S FILE 如果 FILE 是套接字，则-S FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -S or --no-scope-shadowing allows the function to access the variables of calling functions. Normally, any variables inside the function that have the same name as variables from the calling function are "shadowed", and their contents is independent of the calling function.
trans-unit.target: -S 或 --no-scope-shadowing 允许函数访问调用函数的变量。通常，函数中与调用函数中的变量具有相同名称的任何变量都会被“阴影化”，并且其内容与调用函数无关。

trans-unit.source: -S or --no-scope-shadowing allows the function to access the variables of calling functions. Normally, any variables inside the function that have the same name as variables from the calling function are "shadowed", and their contents is independent of the calling function. It's important to note that this does not capture referenced variables or the scope at the time of function declaration! At this time, fish does not have any concept of closures, and variable lifetimes are never extended. In other words, by using --no-scope-shadowing the scope of the function each time it is run is shared with the scope it was called from rather than the scope it was defined in.
-S or --search-mode evaluates to true if the commandline is performing a history search
trans-unit.target: -S 如果命令行正在执行历史记录搜索，则-S或 --search-mode 的计算结果为true

trans-unit.source: -S or --shell enables syntax highlighting, tab completions and command termination suitable for entering shellscript code in the interactive mode. NOTE: Prior to fish 3.0, the short opt for --shell was -s, but it has been changed for compatibility with bash's -s short opt for --silent.
trans-unit.target: -S 或 --shell 启用语法高亮显示，制表符补全和命令终止，适合在交互方式下输入shellscript代码。注意：在fish 3.0之前，-- --shell 的短选项为 -s ，但为了与bash的 -s 短选项 --silent 的兼容性进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: -S or --show Shows information about the given variables. If no variable names are given then all variables are shown in sorted order. No other flags can be used with this option. The information shown includes whether or not it is set in each of the local, global, and universal scopes. If it is set in one of those scopes whether or not it is exported is reported. The individual elements are also shown along with the length of each element.
trans-unit.target: -S 或 --show 显示有关给定变量的信息。如果未给出变量名，则所有变量均按排序顺序显示。此选项不能与其他标志一起使用。显示的信息包括是否在本地，全局和通用范围中的每个范围中进行设置。如果在这些范围之一中设置了它，则报告是否将其导出。还显示了各个元素以及每个元素的长度。

trans-unit.source: -S or --soft sets soft resource limit
trans-unit.target: -S 或 --soft 设置软资源限制

trans-unit.source: -S or --symbolic prints the umask in symbolic form instead of octal form.
trans-unit.target: -S 或 --symbolic 以符号形式而不是八进制形式打印umask。

trans-unit.source: -U or --universal causes the specified shell variable to be given a universal scope. If this option is supplied, the variable will be shared between all the current user's fish instances on the current computer, and will be preserved across restarts of the shell.
trans-unit.target: -U 或 --universal 使指定的shell变量具有通用范围。如果提供此选项，则该变量将在当前计算机上的所有当前用户的fish实例之间共享，并将在重新启动外壳程序时保留。

trans-unit.source: -U or --universal causes the specified shell variable to be made universal.
trans-unit.target: -U 或 --universal 使指定的shell变量通用。

trans-unit.source: -U or --universal to use a universal variable (default).
trans-unit.target: -U 或 --universal 使用通用变量（默认）。

trans-unit.source: -V or --inherit-variable NAME snapshots the value of the variable NAME and defines a local variable with that same name and value when the function is defined. This is similar to a closure in other languages like Python but a bit different. Note the word "snapshot" in the first sentence. If you change the value of the variable after defining the function, even if you do so in the same scope (typically another function) the new value will not be used by the function you just created using this option. See the function notify example below for how this might be used.
trans-unit.target: -V 或 --inherit-variable NAME 快照的变量的值 NAME 并限定被定义该函数时具有相同名称和值的局部变量。这类似于其他语言（如Python）中的闭包，但有些不同。请注意第一句话中的“快照”。如果在定义函数后更改变量的值，即使您在同一范围（通常是另一个函数）中进行更改，新值也不会被使用此选项创建的函数所使用。有关如何使用此 function notify 请参见下面的功能通知示例。

trans-unit.source: -X or --max-args is followed by an integer that defines the maximum number of acceptable non-option arguments. The default is infinity.
trans-unit.target: -X 或 --max-args 后跟一个整数，该整数定义可接受的非选项参数的最大数量。默认值为无穷大。

trans-unit.source: -a NAMES or --argument-names NAMES assigns the value of successive command-line arguments to the names given in NAMES.
trans-unit.target: -a NAMES 或 --argument-names NAMES 将连续命令行参数的值分配给NAMES中给定的名称。

trans-unit.source: -a OPTION_ARGUMENTS or --arguments=OPTION_ARGUMENTS adds the specified option arguments to the completions list.
trans-unit.target: -a OPTION_ARGUMENTS 或 --arguments=OPTION_ARGUMENTS 将指定的选项参数添加到补全列表。

trans-unit.source: -a WORD EXPANSION or --add WORD EXPANSION Adds a new abbreviation, causing WORD to be expanded to EXPANSION.
-a WORD EXPANSION or --add WORD EXPANSION Adds a new abbreviation, causing WORD to be expanded to PHRASE.
trans-unit.target: -a WORD EXPANSION 或 --add WORD EXPANSION 添加新的缩写，使WORD扩展为PHRASE。

trans-unit.source: -a or --all See --erase and --key-names
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --all 请参阅 --erase 和 --key-names

trans-unit.source: -a or --all lists all functions, even those whose name starts with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --all 列出所有功能，甚至包括名称以下划线开头的功能。

trans-unit.source: -a or --all prints all current limits
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --all 打印所有当前限制

trans-unit.source: -a or --all prints all of possible definitions of the specified names.
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --all 打印指定名称的所有可能定义。

trans-unit.source: -a or --all returns all the external COMMANDNAMEs that are found in $PATH in the order they are found.
-a or --all returns all the external commands that are found in $PATH in the order they are found.
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --all 按照找到的顺序返回在 $PATH 中找到的所有外部命令。

trans-unit.source: -a or --append causes the values to be appended to the current set of values for the variable. This can be used with --prepend to both append and prepend at the same time. This cannot be used when assigning to a variable slice.
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --append 会将值追加到变量的当前值集。可以与 --prepend 一起使用，以同时添加和添加。分配给可变切片时，不能使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: -a or --append do not remove the current commandline, append the specified string at the end of it
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --append 不删除当前命令行，在其末尾附加指定的字符串

trans-unit.source: -a or --array stores the result as an array in a single variable.
trans-unit.target: -a 或 --array 将结果作为数组存储在单个变量中。

trans-unit.source: -a or --list stores the result as a list in a single variable. This option is also available as --array for backwards compatibility.
-b FILE returns true if FILE is a block device.
trans-unit.target: -b FILE 如果 FILE 是块设备，则FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -b or --current-buffer select the entire buffer, including any displayed autosuggestion (default)
trans-unit.target: -b 或 --current-buffer 选择整个缓冲区，包括任何显示的自动建议（默认）

trans-unit.source: -b, --backgroundCOLOR sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: -b ，-- --background COLOR设置背景色。

trans-unit.source: -c CMD or --command=CMD sets the initial string in the interactive mode command buffer to CMD.
trans-unit.target: -c CMD 或 --command=CMD 将交互模式命令缓冲区中的初始字符串设置为 CMD 。

trans-unit.source: -c COMMAND or --command COMMAND specifies that COMMAND is the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: -c COMMAND 或 --command COMMAND 指定 COMMAND 是命令的名称。

trans-unit.source: -c FILE returns true if FILE is a character device.
trans-unit.target: -c FILE 如果 FILE 是字符设备，则-c FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -c OLDNAME NEWNAME or --copy OLDNAME NEWNAME creates a new function named NEWNAME, using the definition of the OLDNAME function.
trans-unit.target: -c OLDNAME NEWNAME 或 --copy OLDNAME NEWNAME 使用OLDNAME函数的定义创建一个名为NEWNAME的新函数。

trans-unit.source: -c or --command prints the command name for each process in jobs.
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --command 打印作业中每个进程的命令名称。

trans-unit.source: -c or --command=COMMANDS evaluate the specified commands instead of reading from the commandline
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --command=COMMANDS 评估指定的命令，而不是从命令行读取

trans-unit.source: -c or --contains searches or deletes items in the history that contain the specified text string. This is the default for the --search flag. This is not currently supported by the delete subcommand.
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --contains 搜索或删除历史记录中包含指定文本字符串的项目。这是 --search 标志的默认设置。 delete 子命令当前不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: -c or --continuous begins a session where multiple key sequences can be inspected. By default the program exits after capturing a single key sequence.
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --continuous 开始一个会话，在该会话中可以检查多个键序列。默认情况下，程序在捕获单个键序列后退出。

trans-unit.source: -c or --core-size: the maximum size of core files created. By setting this limit to zero, core dumps can be disabled.
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --core-size ：创建的核心文件的最大大小。通过将此限制设置为零，可以禁用核心转储。

trans-unit.source: -c or --cut-at-cursor only print selection up until the current cursor position
trans-unit.target: -c 或 --cut-at-cursor 仅打印选择直到当前光标位置

trans-unit.source: -c, --print-colors prints a list of the 16 named colors.
trans-unit.target: -c ， --print-colors print -colors打印16种已命名颜色的列表。

trans-unit.source: -d DELIMITER or --delimiter=DELIMITER splits on DELIMITER. DELIMITER will be used as an entire string to split on, not a set of characters.
trans-unit.target: -d DELIMITER 或 --delimiter=DELIMITER 在DELIMITER上分割。DELIMITER将用作分割的整个字符串，而不是一组字符。

trans-unit.source: -d DESCRIPTION or --description=DESCRIPTION changes the description of this function.
trans-unit.target: -d DESCRIPTION description 或 --description=DESCRIPTION 更改此功能的描述。

trans-unit.source: -d DESCRIPTION or --description=DESCRIPTION is a description of what the function does, suitable as a completion description.
trans-unit.target: -d DESCRIPTION description 或 --description=DESCRIPTION 是函数功能的描述，适合作为完成描述。

trans-unit.source: -d FILE returns true if FILE is a directory.
trans-unit.target: -d FILE 如果 FILE 是目录，则-d FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -d or --data-size: the maximum size of a process' data segment.
trans-unit.target: -d 或 --data-size ：进程的数据段的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: -d or --debug-level=DEBUG_LEVEL enables debug output and specifies a verbosity level (like fish -d). Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: -d 或 --debug-level=DEBUG_LEVEL 启用调试输出并指定详细级别（如 fish -d ）。预设为0。

trans-unit.source: -d or --debug-level=DEBUG_LEVEL specify the verbosity level of fish. A higher number means higher verbosity. The default level is 1.
trans-unit.target: -d 或 --debug-level=DEBUG_LEVEL 指定鱼的详细级别。较高的数字表示较高的详细程度。默认级别为1。

trans-unit.source: -d or --debug=CATEGORY_GLOB enables debug output and specifies a glob for matching debug categories (like fish -d). Defaults to empty.
-d, --dim sets dim mode.
trans-unit.target: -d ，-- --dim 设置暗淡模式。

trans-unit.source: -e FILE returns true if FILE exists.
trans-unit.target: -e FILE 如果 FILE 存在，则FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -e WORD or --erase WORD Erase the abbreviation WORD.
trans-unit.target: -e WORD 或 --erase WORD 删除缩写WORD。

trans-unit.source: -e command or --editor command Open the function body inside the text editor given by the command (for example, -e vi). The special command fish will use the built-in editor (same as specifying -i).
trans-unit.target: -e command 或 --editor command 在命令给定的文本编辑器中打开函数体（例如， -e vi ）。特殊命令 fish 将使用内置编辑器（与指定 -i 相同）。

trans-unit.source: -e or --erase Erase the binding with the given sequence and mode instead of defining a new one. Multiple sequences can be specified with this flag. Specifying -a or --all with -M or --mode erases all binds in the given mode regardless of sequence. Specifying -a or --all without -M or --mode erases all binds in all modes regardless of sequence.
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --erase 使用给定的序列和模式擦除绑定，而不是定义新的绑定。可以使用此标志指定多个序列。与 -M 或 --mode 一起指定 -a 或 --all 会擦除给定模式下的所有绑定，而与序列无关。指定 -a 或 --all 而不使用 -M 或 --mode 会擦除所有模式下的所有绑定，无论顺序如何。

trans-unit.source: -e or --erase Release global block
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --erase 释放全局块

trans-unit.source: -e or --erase causes the specified functions to be erased.
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --erase 导致删除指定的功能。

trans-unit.source: -e or --erase causes the specified functions to be erased. This also means that it is prevented from autoloading.
-e or --erase causes the specified shell variable to be erased
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --erase 导致指定的shell变量被擦除

trans-unit.source: -e or --erase deletes the specified completion.
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --erase 删除指定的完成。

trans-unit.source: -e or --exact searches or deletes items in the history that exactly match the specified text string. This is the default for the delete subcommand. Note that the match is case-insensitive by default. If you really want an exact match, including letter case, you must use the -C or --case-sensitive flag.
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --exact 搜索或删除历史记录中与指定文本字符串完全匹配的项目。这是 delete 子命令的默认设置。请注意，默认情况下，匹配项不区分大小写。如果您确实想要完全匹配（包括字母大小写），则必须使用 -C 或 --case-sensitive 标志。

trans-unit.source: -e or --on-event EVENT_NAME tells fish to run this function when the specified named event is emitted. Fish internally generates named events e.g. when showing the prompt.
trans-unit.target: -e 或 --on-event EVENT_NAME 会在发出指定的命名事件时告诉fish运行此函数。Fish在内部显示命名事件，例如在显示提示时。

trans-unit.source: -e, Enable interpretation of backslash escapes
trans-unit.target: -e ，启用反斜杠转义的解释

trans-unit.source: -f FILE returns true if FILE is a regular file.
trans-unit.target: -f FILE 如果 FILE 是常规文件，则-f FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -f or --features=FEATURES enables one or more feature flags (separated by a comma). These are how fish stages changes that might break scripts.
-f or --features=FEATURES enables one or more feature flags (separated by a comma). These are how fish stages changes that might break scripts.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --features=FEATURES 启用一个或多个功能标志（以逗号分隔）。这些是鱼阶段更改可能破坏脚本的方式。

trans-unit.source: -f or --file-size: the maximum size of files created by the shell.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --file-size ：shell创建的文件的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: -f or --file will cause psub to use a regular file instead of a named pipe to communicate with the calling process. This will cause psub to be significantly slower when large amounts of data are involved, but has the advantage that the reading process can seek in the stream. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --file 将导致psub使用常规文件而不是命名管道来与调用进程进行通信。当涉及大量数据时，这将导致 psub 明显变慢，但具有读取过程可以在流中进行搜索的优点。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: -f or --function-names Display a list of available input functions
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --function-names 显示可用输入功能的列表

trans-unit.source: -f or --function causes any additional arguments to be interpreted as input functions, and puts them into the queue, so that they will be read before any additional actual key presses are. This option cannot be combined with any other option. See bind for a list of input functions.

-f or --function inject readline functions into the reader. This option cannot be combined with any other option. It will cause any additional arguments to be interpreted as readline functions, and these functions will be injected into the reader, so that they will be returned to the reader before any additional actual key presses are read.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --function 将readline函数插入阅读器。此选项不能与任何其他选项组合使用。它将导致任何其他参数被解释为readline函数，并且这些函数将被注入读取器，以便在读取任何其他实际按键之前将它们返回给读取器。

trans-unit.source: -f or --no-files says that the options specified by this completion may not be followed by a filename.
-f or --no-files specifies that the options specified by this completion may not be followed by a filename.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --no-files 指定此完成操作指定的选项后不能跟文件名。

trans-unit.source: -f or --no-functions suppresses function and builtin lookup.
trans-unit.target: -f 或 --no-functions 禁止功能和内置查找。

trans-unit.source: -g FILE returns true if FILE has the set-group-ID bit set.
trans-unit.target: -g FILE 如果 FILE 设置了set-group-ID位，则-g FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -g or --global Never automatically release the lock
trans-unit.target: -g 或 --global 从不自动释放锁定

trans-unit.source: -g or --global causes the specified shell variable to be given a global scope. Non-global variables disappear when the block they belong to ends
trans-unit.target: -g 或 --global 使指定的shell变量具有全局作用域。非全局变量在其所属的块结束时消失

trans-unit.source: -g or --global makes the variables global.
trans-unit.target: -g 或 --global 使变量成为全局变量。

trans-unit.source: -g or --global to use a global variable.
trans-unit.target: -g 或 --global 使用全局变量。

trans-unit.source: -g or --group only prints the group ID of each job.
trans-unit.target: -g 或 --group 仅打印每个作业的组ID。

trans-unit.source: -h or --help display help for this command.
trans-unit.target: -h 或 --help 显示此命令的帮助。

trans-unit.source: -h or --help displays help about using this command.
trans-unit.target: -h 或 --help 显示有关使用此命令的帮助。

trans-unit.source: -h or --help prints this message.
trans-unit.target: -h 或 --help 打印此消息。

trans-unit.source: -h or --help prints usage information.
trans-unit.target: -h 或 --help 打印用法信息。

trans-unit.source: -i or --ignore-unknown ignores unknown options, keeping them and their arguments in $argv instead.
-i or --index print the word index
trans-unit.target: -i 或 --index 打印单词index

trans-unit.source: -i or --insert do not remove the current commandline, insert the specified string at the current cursor position
trans-unit.target: -i 或 --insert 不删除当前命令行，在当前光标位置插入指定的字符串

trans-unit.source: -i or --interactive Force opening the function body in the built-in editor even if $VISUAL or $EDITOR is defined.
trans-unit.target: -i 或 --interactive 即使已定义 $VISUAL 或 $EDITOR 也将在内置编辑器中强制打开功能主体。

trans-unit.source: -i or --interactive specify that fish is to run in interactive mode
trans-unit.target: -i 或 --interactive 指定fish将以交互方式运行

trans-unit.source: -i or --no-indent do not indent commands; only reformat to one job per line.
trans-unit.target: -i 或 --no-indent 不缩进命令；每行只能重新格式化为一份工作。

trans-unit.source: -i, --italics sets italics mode.
trans-unit.target: -i ，-- --italics 设置斜体模式。

trans-unit.source: -j PGID or --on-job-exit PGID tells fish to run this function when the job with group ID PGID exits. Instead of PGID, the string 'caller' can be specified. This is only legal when in a command substitution, and will result in the handler being triggered by the exit of the job which created this command substitution.
trans-unit.target: -j PGID 当具有组ID PGID的作业退出时，-j PGID或 --on-job-exit PGID 告诉fish运行此功能。可以指定字符串“ caller”代替PGID。这仅在使用命令替换时才合法，并且将导致创建该命令替换的作业的退出触发处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -j or --current-job select the current job
trans-unit.target: -j 或 --current-job 选择当前作业

trans-unit.source: -k FILE returns true if FILE has the sticky bit set. If the OS does not support the concept it returns false. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sticky_bit.
trans-unit.target: -k FILE 如果 FILE 设置了粘性位，则-k FILE返回true 。如果操作系统不支持该概念，则返回false。参见https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sticky_bit。

trans-unit.source: -k or --keep-order preserves the order of the OPTION_ARGUMENTS specified via -a or --arguments instead of sorting alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: -k 或 --keep-order 保留通过 -a 或 --arguments 指定的 OPTION_ARGUMENTS 的顺序，而不是按字母顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: -k or --keep-order preserves the order of the OPTION_ARGUMENTS specified via -a or --arguments instead of sorting alphabetically. Multiple complete calls with -k result in arguments of the later ones displayed first.
-k or --key Specify a key name, such as 'left' or 'backspace' instead of a character sequence
trans-unit.target: -k 或 --key 指定键名，例如'left'或'backspace'而不是字符序列

trans-unit.source: -l LONG_OPTION or --long-option=LONG_OPTION adds a GNU style long option to the completions list.
trans-unit.target: -l LONG_OPTION 或 --long-option=LONG_OPTION 将GNU样式的long选项添加到完成列表。

trans-unit.source: -l or --last prints only the last job to be started.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --last 仅打印要开始的最后一个作业。

trans-unit.source: -l or --list-signals prints a list of signal names.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --list-signals 打印信号名称列表。

trans-unit.source: -l or --list Lists all abbreviated words.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --list 列出所有缩写词。

trans-unit.source: -l or --local Release the block automatically at the end of the current innermost code block scope
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --local 在当前最里面的代码块作用域的末尾自动释放该块

trans-unit.source: -l or --local forces the specified shell variable to be given a scope that is local to the current block, even if a variable with the given name exists and is non-local
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --local 强制为指定的shell变量赋予当前块本地的作用域，即使存在具有给定名称的变量且该变量不是本地的

trans-unit.source: -l or --local makes the variables local.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --local 将变量设为本地。

trans-unit.source: -l or --lock-size: the maximum size that may be locked into memory.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --lock-size ：可以锁定到内存中的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: -l or --login specify that fish is to run as a login shell
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --login 指定fish将作为登录shell运行

trans-unit.source: -l or --long takes a string that is used as the long flag in the option being defined. This option is optional and has no default. If no long flag is defined then only the short flag will be allowed when parsing arguments using the option spec.
trans-unit.target: -l 或 --long 接受一个字符串，该字符串用作所定义选项中的long标志。此选项是可选的，没有默认值。如果未定义长标记，则使用选项spec解析参数时仅允许短标记。

trans-unit.source: -m NEW_MODE or --sets-mode NEW_MODE Change the current mode to NEW_MODE after this binding is executed
trans-unit.target: -m NEW_MODE 或 --sets-mode NEW_MODE 执行此绑定后，将当前模式更改为 NEW_MODE

trans-unit.source: -m or --resident-set-size: the maximum resident set size.
trans-unit.target: -m 或 --resident-set-size ：最大居民集大小。

trans-unit.source: -n NCHARS or --nchars=NCHARS makes read return after reading NCHARS characters or the end of the line, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: -n NCHARS 或 --nchars=NCHARS 在读取NCHARS字符或行尾（以先到者为准）后，将使 read 返回。

trans-unit.source: -n STRING returns true if the length of STRING is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: -n STRING 如果长度返回true STRING 是非零的。

trans-unit.source: -n or --condition specifies a shell command that must return 0 if the completion is to be used. This makes it possible to specify completions that should only be used in some cases.
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --condition 指定一个shell命令，如果要使用补全，则必须返回0。这样就可以指定仅在某些情况下应使用的完成。

trans-unit.source: -n or --file-descriptor-count: the maximum number of open file descriptors (most systems do not allow this value to be set).
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --file-descriptor-count ：打开文件描述符的最大数量（大多数系统不允许设置此值）。

trans-unit.source: -n or --name is the command name for use in error messages. By default the current function name will be used, or argparse if run outside of a function.
-n or --name is the command name to insert into any error messages. If you don't provide this value argparse will be used.
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --name 是要插入任何错误消息的命令名称。如果不提供此值，将使用 argparse 。

trans-unit.source: -n or --names List only the names of all defined variables, not their value. The names are guaranteed to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --names 仅列出所有已定义变量的名称，而不列出其值。名称保证会被排序。

trans-unit.source: -n or --names List the names of all defined builtins
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --names 列出所有已定义内建函数的名称

trans-unit.source: -n or --names lists the names of all defined functions.
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --names 列出所有已定义函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: -n or --no-execute do not execute any commands, only perform syntax checking
trans-unit.target: -n 或 --no-execute 不执行任何命令，仅执行语法检查

trans-unit.source: -n, Do not output a newline
trans-unit.target: -n ，不输出换行符

trans-unit.source: -o LONG_OPTION or --old-option=LONG_OPTION adds an old style long option to the completions list (See below for details).
trans-unit.target: -o LONG_OPTION 或 --old-option=LONG_OPTION 将旧样式的长选项添加到补全列表（有关详细信息，请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: -o or --debug-output=path Specify a file path to receive the debug output, including categories and fish_trace. The default is stderr.

-o or --optional-val means the option being defined can take a value but it is optional rather than required. If the option is seen more than once when parsing arguments only the last value seen is saved. This means the resulting flag variable created by argparse will zero elements if no value was given with the option else it will have exactly one element.

-o or --optional means the option being defined can take a value but it is optional rather than required. If the option is seen more than once when parsing arguments only the last value seen is saved. This means the resulting flag variable created by argparse will zero elements if no value was given with the option else it will have exactly one element.
trans-unit.target: -o 或 --optional 表示所定义的选项可以带有值，但它是可选的，而不是必需的。如果在解析参数时多次看到该选项，则仅保存最后看到的值。这意味着如果未使用选项给出值，则由 argparse 创建的结果标志变量将为零个元素，否则将只有一个元素。

trans-unit.source: -o or --tokenize tokenize the selection and print one string-type token per line
trans-unit.target: -o 或 --tokenize 对选择进行标记，并每行打印一个字符串类型的标记

trans-unit.source: -o, --bold sets bold mode.
trans-unit.target: -o ，-- --bold 设置粗体模式。

trans-unit.source: -p COMMAND or --path COMMAND specifies that COMMAND is the absolute path of the program (optionally containing wildcards).
trans-unit.target: -p COMMAND 或 --path COMMAND 指定 COMMAND 是程序的绝对路径（可选包含通配符）。

trans-unit.source: -p FILE returns true if FILE is a named pipe.
trans-unit.target: -p FILE 如果 FILE 是命名管道，则-p FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -p PID or --on-process-exit PID tells fish to run this function when the fish child process with process ID PID exits. Instead of a PID, for backward compatibility, "%self" can be specified as an alias for $fish_pid, and the function will be run when the current fish instance exits.

-p PID or --on-process-exit PID tells fish to run this function when the fish child process with process ID PID exits. Instead of a PID, for backward compatibility, "`%self`" can be specified as an alias for $fish_pid, and the function will be run when the current fish instance exits.
trans-unit.target: -p PID 或 --on-process-exit PID 会告诉Fish在退出具有进程ID PID的fish子进程时运行此功能。为了向后兼容，可以将 $fish_pid ％_ self指定为$ fish_pid的别名，以代替向后兼容，该函数将在当前fish实例退出时运行。

trans-unit.source: -p PROMPT_CMD or --prompt=PROMPT_CMD uses the output of the shell command PROMPT_CMD as the prompt for the interactive mode. The default prompt command is set_color green; echo read; set_color normal; echo "> "

-p PROMPT_CMD or --prompt=PROMPT_CMD uses the output of the shell command PROMPT_CMD as the prompt for the interactive mode. The default prompt command is set_color green; echo read; set_color normal; echo "> ".
trans-unit.target: -p PROMPT_CMD 或--prompt --prompt=PROMPT_CMD 使用shell命令 PROMPT_CMD 的输出作为交互模式的提示。默认的提示命令是 set_color green; echo read; set_color normal; echo "> " 。

trans-unit.source: -p or --as-command outputs the umask in a form that may be reused as input
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --as-command 以可复用为输入的形式输出umask

trans-unit.source: -p or --current-process select the current process
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --current-process 选择当前进程

trans-unit.source: -p or --path prints the path to NAME if NAME resolves to an executable file in $PATH, the path to the script containing the definition of the function NAME if NAME resolves to a function loaded from a file on disk (i.e. not interactively defined at the prompt), or nothing otherwise.
-p or --path returns the name of the disk file that would be executed, or nothing if type -t name would not return file.
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --path 返回将要执行的磁盘文件的名称，如果 type -t name 不返回 file ，则什么都不返回。

trans-unit.source: -p or --pid prints the process ID for each process in all jobs.
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --pid 打印所有作业中每个进程的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: -p or --prefix searches or deletes items in the history that begin with the specified text string. This is not currently supported by the --delete flag.
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --prefix 搜索或删除历史记录中以指定文本字符串开头的项目。 --delete 标志当前不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: -p or --prepend causes the values to be prepended to the current set of values for the variable. This can be used with --append to both append and prepend at the same time. This cannot be used when assigning to a variable slice.
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --prepend 会使这些值被预先设置为该变量的当前值集。可以将它与 --append 一起使用，以同时追加和前置。分配给可变切片时，不能使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: -p or --print prints all defined signal handlers.
trans-unit.target: -p 或 --print 打印所有定义的信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -p or --profile=PROFILE_FILE when fish exits, output timing information on all executed commands to the specified file
trans-unit.target: -p 鱼退出时，-p或 --profile=PROFILE_FILE ，将所有已执行命令的计时信息输出到指定文件

trans-unit.source: -q or --query Return 0 (true) if one of the WORDs is an abbreviation.
-q or --query test if the specified variable names are defined. Does not output anything, but the builtins exit status is the number of variables specified that were not defined.
trans-unit.target: -q 或 --query 测试是否定义了指定的变量名。不输出任何内容，但是内建退出状态是指定的未定义变量的数量。

trans-unit.source: -q or --query tests if any of the specified builtins exists
-q or --query tests if the specified functions exist.
trans-unit.target: -q 或 --query 测试指定的功能是否存在。

trans-unit.source: -q or --quiet prints no output for evaluation of jobs by exit code only.
trans-unit.target: -q 或 --quiet 仅通过退出代码不输出任何输出来评估作业。

trans-unit.source: -q or --quiet prints no output for evaluation of jobs by exit status only.
-q or --quiet suppresses all output; this is useful when testing the exit status.
trans-unit.target: -q 或 --quiet 禁止所有输出；这在测试退出状态时很有用。

trans-unit.source: -q or --quiet, in conjunction with -s, silences the output and prints nothing, setting only the exit code.
trans-unit.target: -q 或 --quiet 与 -s 结合使用时，将使输出静音，并且不打印任何内容，仅设置退出代码。

trans-unit.source: -q or --quiet, silences the output and prints nothing, setting only the exit status. Implies --search.
-r FILE returns true if FILE is marked as readable.
trans-unit.target: -r FILE 如果 FILE 被标记为可读，则-r FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -r OLD_WORD NEW_WORD or --rename OLD_WORD NEW_WORD Renames an abbreviation, from OLD_WORD to NEW_WORD.
trans-unit.target: -r OLD_WORD NEW_WORD 或 --rename OLD_WORD NEW_WORD 重命名缩写，从OLD_WORD到NEW_WORD。

trans-unit.source: -r or --replace remove the current commandline and replace it with the specified string (default)
trans-unit.target: -r 或 --replace 删除当前命令行并将其替换为指定的字符串（默认）

trans-unit.source: -r or --require-parameter says that the options specified by this completion must have an option argument, i.e. may not be followed by another option.
-r or --require-parameter specifies that the options specified by this completion always must have an option argument, i.e. may not be followed by another option.
trans-unit.target: -r 或 --require-parameter 指定此完成操作指定的选项必须始终具有选项参数，即，不得在其后跟随另一个选项。

trans-unit.source: -r or --required-val means the option being defined requires a value. If the option is seen more than once when parsing arguments only the last value seen is saved. This means the resulting flag variable created by argparse will have exactly one element.

-r or --required means the option being defined requires a value. If the option is seen more than once when parsing arguments only the last value seen is saved. This means the resulting flag variable created by argparse will have exactly one element.
trans-unit.target: -r 或 --required 表示所定义的选项需要一个值。如果在解析参数时多次看到该选项，则仅保存最后看到的值。这意味着由 argparse 创建的结果标志变量将只有一个元素。

trans-unit.source: -r, --reverse sets reverse mode.
trans-unit.target: -r ，-- --reverse 设置反向模式。

trans-unit.source: -s FILE returns true if the size of FILE is greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: -s FILE 如果大小返回true FILE 大于零。

trans-unit.source: -s SHORT_OPTION or --short-option=SHORT_OPTION adds a short option to the completions list.
trans-unit.target: -s SHORT_OPTION 或 --short-option=SHORT_OPTION 将简短选项添加到完成列表。

trans-unit.source: -s or --current-selection selects the current selection
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --current-selection 选择当前选择

trans-unit.source: -s or --on-signal SIGSPEC tells fish to run this function when the signal SIGSPEC is delivered. SIGSPEC can be a signal number, or the signal name, such as SIGHUP (or just HUP).
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --on-signal SIGSPEC 告诉鱼在传递信号SIGSPEC时运行此功能。SIGSPEC可以是信号编号或信号名称，例如SIGHUP（或仅仅是HUP）。

trans-unit.source: -s or --save Automatically save the function after successfully editing it.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --save 成功编辑后自动保存功能。

trans-unit.source: -s or --save Automatically save the function created by the alias into your fish configuration directory using funcsave.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --save 使用funcsave将别名创建的功能自动保存到您的fish配置目录中。

trans-unit.source: -s or --save Automatically save the function created by the alias into your fish configuration directory using funcsave.
-s or --search returns the name of the external command that would be executed, or nothing if no file with the specified name could be found in the $PATH.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --search 返回将要执行的外部命令的名称，如果在 $PATH 找不到指定名称的文件，则不返回任何名称。

trans-unit.source: -s or --short suppresses function expansion when used with no options or with -a/--all.
-s or --short takes a single letter that is used as the short flag in the option being defined. This option is mandatory.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --short 采用单个字母，该字母用作所定义选项中的short标志。此选项是必需的。

trans-unit.source: -s or --show Show all abbreviations in a manner suitable for export and import.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --show 以适合于导出和导入的方式显示所有缩写。

trans-unit.source: -s or --silent masks characters written to the terminal, replacing them with asterisks. This is useful for reading things like passwords or other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --silent 屏蔽写入终端的字符，并用星号代替。这对于读取密码或其他敏感信息等内容很有用。

trans-unit.source: -s or --stack-size: the maximum stack size.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --stack-size ：最大堆栈大小。

trans-unit.source: -s or --stop-nonopt causes scanning the arguments to stop as soon as the first non-option argument is seen. Among other things, this is useful to implement subcommands that have their own options.

-s or --stop-nonopt causes scanning the arguments to stop as soon as the first non-option argument is seen. Using this arg is equivalent to calling the C function getopt_long() with the short options starting with a + symbol. This is sometimes known as "POSIXLY CORRECT". If this flag is not used then arguments are reordered (i.e., permuted) so that all non-option arguments are moved after option arguments. This mode has several uses but the main one is to implement a command that has subcommands.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --stop-nonopt 导致在看到第一个非选项参数后立即停止扫描参数。使用此arg等效于调用C函数 getopt_long() ，并使用以 + 符号开头的简短选项。有时也称为“正确修正”。如果未使用此标志，则参数将重新排序（即排列），以便所有非选项参数都移动到选项参数之后。此模式有多种用途，但主要用途是实现带有子命令的命令。

trans-unit.source: -s or --suffix will append SUFFIX to the filename.
trans-unit.target: -s 或 --suffix 将在文件名后附加SUFFIX。

trans-unit.source: -s, Do not separate arguments with spaces
trans-unit.target: -s ，不要用空格分隔参数

trans-unit.source: -sN or --scale=N sets the scale of the result. N must be an integer or the word "max" for the maximum scale. A scale of zero causes results to be rounded down to the nearest integer. So 3/2 returns 1 rather than 2 which 1.5 would normally round to. This is for compatibility with bc which was the basis for this command prior to fish 3.0.0. Scale values greater than zero causes the result to be rounded using the usual rules to the specified number of decimal places.

-sN or --scale=N sets the scale of the result. N must be an integer. A scale of zero causes results to be rounded down to the nearest integer. So 3/2 returns 1 rather than 2 which 1.5 would normally round to. This is for compatibility with bc which was the basis for this command prior to fish 3.0.0. Scale values greater than zero causes the result to be rounded using the usual rules to the specified number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: -sN 或 --scale=N 组结果的尺度。 N 必须为整数。小数位数为零会导致结果四舍五入到最接近的整数。因此 3/2 返回 1 而不是 2 ，而 1.5 通常会取整为2。这是为了与 bc 兼容，后者是fish 3.0.0之前此命令的基础。小数位数大于零会导致使用常规规则将结果舍入到指定的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: -t FD returns true if the file descriptor FD is a terminal (TTY).
trans-unit.target: -t FD 如果文件描述符 FD 是终端（TTY），则-t FD返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -t -or --tokenize causes read to split the input into variables by the shell's tokenization rules. This means it will honor quotes and escaping. This option is of course incompatible with other options to control splitting like --delimiter and does not honor $IFS (like fish's tokenizer). It saves the tokens in the manner they'd be passed to commands on the commandline, so e.g. a\ b is stored as a b. Note that currently it leaves command substitutions intact along with the parentheses.
-t or --cpu-time: the maximum amount of CPU time in seconds.
trans-unit.target: -t 或 --cpu-time ：最大CPU时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: -t or --current-token select the current token
trans-unit.target: -t 或 --current-token 选择当前令牌

trans-unit.source: -t or --handlers-type TYPE will show all event handlers matching the given type
trans-unit.target: -t 或 --handlers-type TYPE 将显示与给定类型匹配的所有事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: -t or --show-time prepends each history entry with the date and time the entry was recorded. By default it uses the strftime format # %c%n. You can specify another format; e.g., --show-time="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S " or --show-time="%a%I%p". The short option, -t, doesn't accept a strftime format string; it only uses the default format. Any strftime format is allowed, including %s to get the raw UNIX seconds since the epoch.

-t or --show-time prepends each history entry with the date and time the entry was recorded. By default it uses the strftime format # cn. You can specify another format; e.g., --show-time="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S " or --show-time="%a%I%p". The short option, -t, doesn't accept a strftime format string; it only uses the default format. Any strftime format is allowed, including s to get the raw UNIX seconds since the epoch.
trans-unit.target: -t 或 --show-time 在每个历史记录条目之前加上记录该条目的日期和时间。默认情况下，它使用strftime格式 # cn 。您可以指定其他格式。例如 --show-time="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S " 或 --show-time="%a%I%p" 。简短的选项 -t 不接受strftime格式的字符串。它仅使用默认格式。允许使用任何strftime格式，包括 s 以获得自该时期以来的原始UNIX秒。

trans-unit.source: -t or --type prints function, builtin, or file if NAME is a shell function, builtin, or disk file, respectively.
trans-unit.target: -t 或 --type 打印 function ， builtin ，或 file 如果 NAME 是一个外壳的功能，内置，或磁盘文件，分别。

trans-unit.source: -u FILE returns true if FILE has the set-user-ID bit set.
trans-unit.target: -u FILE 如果 FILE 设置了设置用户ID位，则-u FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -u and --unauthoritative no longer do anything and are silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: -u 和 --unauthoritative 不再执行任何操作，并且被忽略。

trans-unit.source: -u or --process-count: the maximum number of processes available to a single user.
trans-unit.target: -u 或 --process-count ：单个用户可用的最大进程数。

trans-unit.source: -u or --unexport causes the specified shell variable to NOT be exported to child processes
trans-unit.target: -u 或 --unexport 导致指定的shell变量不导出到子进程

trans-unit.source: -u or --unexport prevents the variables from being exported to child processes (default behaviour).
trans-unit.target: -u 或 --unexport 阻止将变量导出到子进程（默认行为）。

trans-unit.source: -u, --underline sets underlined mode.
trans-unit.target: -u ，-- --underline 设置下划线模式。

trans-unit.source: -v or --on-variable VARIABLE_NAME tells fish to run this function when the variable VARIABLE_NAME changes value.
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --on-variable VARIABLE_NAME 告诉Fish在变量VARIABLE_NAME更改值时运行此功能。

trans-unit.source: -v or --verbose will make some output more verbose.
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --verbose 将使某些输出更加详细。

trans-unit.source: -v or --version display version and exit
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --version 显示版本并退出

trans-unit.source: -v or --version displays the current fish version and then exits.
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --version 显示当前的鱼版本，然后退出。

trans-unit.source: -v or --version prints fish_key_reader's version and exits.
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --version 打印fish_key_reader的版本并退出。

trans-unit.source: -v or --virtual-memory-size The maximum amount of virtual memory available to the shell.
trans-unit.target: -v 或 --virtual-memory-size Shell可用的最大虚拟内存量。

trans-unit.source: -w FILE returns true if FILE is marked as writable; note that this does not check if the filesystem is read-only.
trans-unit.target: -w FILE 如果 FILE 被标记为可写，则FILE返回true ；请注意，这不会检查文件系统是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: -w WRAPPED_COMMAND or --wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND causes the function to inherit completions from the given wrapped command. See the documentation for complete for more information.
trans-unit.target: -w WRAPPED_COMMAND 或 --wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND 使该函数从给定的包装命令继承补全。有关更多信息，请参见文档以获取 complete 信息。

trans-unit.source: -w WRAPPED_COMMAND or --wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND causes the function to inherit completions from the given wrapped command. See the documentation for complete for more information.
-w WRAPPED_COMMAND or --wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND causes the specified command to inherit completions from the wrapped command (See below for details).
trans-unit.target: -w WRAPPED_COMMAND 或 --wraps=WRAPPED_COMMAND 导致指定的命令从包装的命令继承补全（有关详细信息，请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: -w or --write indents a specified file and immediately writes to that file.
trans-unit.target: -w 或 --write 缩进指定的文件，然后立即写入该文件。

trans-unit.source: -x FILE returns true if FILE is marked as executable.
trans-unit.target: -x FILE 如果 FILE 被标记为可执行文件，则-x FILE返回true 。

trans-unit.source: -x or --exclusive implies both -r and -f.
trans-unit.target: -x 或 --exclusive 表示 -r 和 -f 。

trans-unit.source: -x or --exclusive should be followed by a comma separated list of short of long options that are mutually exclusive. You can use this option more than once to define multiple sets of mutually exclusive options.
trans-unit.target: -x 或 --exclusive 之后应是一个逗号分隔的列表，该列表包含相互排斥的长选项。您可以多次使用此选项来定义多组互斥选项。

trans-unit.source: -x or --exclusive should be followed by a comma separated list of short or long options that are mutually exclusive. You can use this more than once to define multiple sets of mutually exclusive options.
-x or --export causes the specified shell variable to be exported to child processes (making it an "environment variable")
trans-unit.target: -x 或 --export 导致将指定的shell变量导出到子进程（使其成为“环境变量”）

trans-unit.source: -x or --export exports the variables to child processes.
trans-unit.target: -x 或 --export 将变量导出到子进程。

trans-unit.source: -z STRING returns true if the length of STRING is zero.
trans-unit.target: -z STRING 如果长度返回true STRING 为零。

trans-unit.source: -z or --null causes history entries written by the search operations to be terminated by a NUL character rather than a newline. This allows the output to be processed by read -z to correctly handle multiline history entries.
trans-unit.target: -z 或 --null 导致由搜索操作写入的历史记录条目以NUL字符而不是换行符终止。这使输出可以由 read -z 处理，以正确处理多行历史记录条目。

trans-unit.source: -z or --null marks the end of the line with the NUL character, instead of newline. This also disables interactive mode.
trans-unit.target: -z 或 --null 用NUL字符而不是换行符标记行的结尾。这也会禁用交互模式。

trans-unit.source: . (a single period) is an alias for the source command. The use of . is deprecated in favour of source, and . will be removed in a future version of fish.
trans-unit.target: . （单个句点）是 source 命令的别名。的使用 . 不推荐使用 source ，并且 . 将在未来版本的fish中删除。

trans-unit.source: . any character except newline
trans-unit.target: . 除换行符外的任何字符

trans-unit.target: /usr/share/fish/vendor_conf.d （在编译时设置；默认情况下， $__fish_data_dir/conf.d ）

trans-unit.target: ? 0或1。

trans-unit.source: ? can match any single character except '/'.

trans-unit.source: ? can match any single character except '/'. This is deprecated and can be disabled via the qmark-noglobfeature flag, so ? will just be an ordinary character.
??? matches any file in the current directory whose name is exactly three characters long.

trans-unit.source: ARG is the command to be executed on signal delivery.
trans-unit.target: ARG 是在信号传递时执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: BROWSER, the user's preferred web browser. If this variable is set, fish will use the specified browser instead of the system default browser to display the fish documentation.
trans-unit.target: BROWSER ，用户首选的Web浏览器。如果设置了此变量，则fish将使用指定的浏览器而不是系统默认的浏览器来显示fish文档。

trans-unit.source: CDPATH, a list of directories in which to search for the new directory for the cd builtin.
CDPATH, an array of directories in which to search for the new directory for the cd builtin.
trans-unit.target: CDPATH ，目录数组，可在其中搜索 cd 内置文件的新目录。

trans-unit.source: CMD_DURATION, the runtime of the last command in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: CMD_DURATION ，最后一个命令的运行时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: COLUMNS and LINES, the current size of the terminal in height and width. These values are only used by fish if the operating system does not report the size of the terminal. Both variables must be set in that case otherwise a default of 80x24 will be used. They are updated when the window size changes.
trans-unit.target: COLUMNS 和 LINES ，当前终端大小的高度和宽度。仅当操作系统未报告终端大小时，fish才会使用这些值。在这种情况下，必须同时设置两个变量，否则将使用默认值80x24。当窗口大小更改时，它们会更新。

trans-unit.source: COMMAND can be any fish command, but it can also be one of a set of special input functions. These include functions for moving the cursor, operating on the kill-ring, performing tab completion, etc. Use bind --function-names for a complete list of these input functions.
trans-unit.target: COMMAND 可以是任何fish命令，但也可以是一组特殊输入功能之一。其中包括用于移动光标，在kill-ring上操作，执行制表符完成等功能。请使用 bind --function-names 获得这些输入功能的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: COMMAND is the name of the command for which to add a completion.

trans-unit.target: COND1 -o COND2 如果 COND1 或 COND2 为true，则COND1 -o COND2返回true。

trans-unit.source: HOME, the user's home directory. This variable can be changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: HOME ，用户的主目录。用户可以更改此变量。

trans-unit.source: IFS, the internal field separator that is used for word splitting with the read builtin. Setting this to the empty string will also disable line splitting in command substitution. This variable can be changed by the user.

IFS, the internal field separator that is used for word splitting with the read builtin. Setting this to the empty string will also disable line splitting in command substitution. This variable can be changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: IFS ，内部字段分隔符，用于通过内置读取器拆分单词。将此设置为空字符串还将禁用命令替换中的行拆分。用户可以更改此变量。

trans-unit.source: LANG, LC_ALL, LC_COLLATE, LC_CTYPE, LC_MESSAGES, LC_MONETARY, LC_NUMERIC and LC_TIME set the language option for the shell and subprograms. See the section Locale variables for more information.
trans-unit.target: LANG ， LC_ALL ， LC_COLLATE ， LC_CTYPE ， LC_MESSAGES ， LC_MONETARY ， LC_NUMERIC 和 LC_TIME 设置外壳程序和子程序的语言选项。有关更多信息，请参见区域设置变量部分。

trans-unit.source: LANG, LC_ALL, LC_COLLATE, LC_CTYPE, LC_MESSAGES, LC_MONETARY, LC_NUMERIC and LC_TIME set the language option for the shell and subprograms. These variables work as follows: LC_ALL forces all the aspects of the locale to the specified value. If LC_ALL is set, all other locale variables will be ignored. The other LC_ variables set the specified aspect of the locale information. LANG is a fallback value, it will be used if none of the LC_ variables are specified.
trans-unit.target: LANG ， LC_ALL ， LC_COLLATE ， LC_CTYPE ， LC_MESSAGES ， LC_MONETARY ， LC_NUMERIC 和 LC_TIME 设置外壳程序和子程序的语言选项。这些变量的工作方式如下： LC_ALL 将语言环境的所有方面强制为指定值。如果设置了 LC_ALL ，则将忽略所有其他语言环境变量。其他 LC_ 变量设置语言环境信息的指定方面。 LANG 是后备值，如果未指定 LC_ 变量，将使用该值。

trans-unit.source: LONG_OPTION is a multi character option for the command.
trans-unit.target: LONG_OPTION 是命令的多字符选项。

trans-unit.source: NAME is the name of the alias
trans-unit.target: NAME 是别名的名称

trans-unit.target: NUM1 -eq NUM2 如果 NUM1 和 NUM2 在数值上相等，则NUM1 -eq NUM2返回true 。

trans-unit.target: NUM1 -gt NUM2 如果返回true NUM1 大于 NUM2 。

trans-unit.source: NUM1 -ne NUM2 returns true if NUM1 and NUM2 are not numerically equal.

trans-unit.target: OPTION_ARGUMENTS 是包含用空格分隔的可能选项参数列表的参数，其中可能包含命令替换。

trans-unit.source: PATH, a list of directories in which to search for commands
PATH, an array of directories in which to search for commands

trans-unit.source: PWD, the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: PWD ，当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: RANDOM generates a pseudo-random integer from a uniform distribution. The range (inclusive) is dependent on the arguments passed. No arguments indicate a range of [0; 32767]. If one argument is specified, the internal engine will be seeded with the argument for future invocations of RANDOM and no output will be produced. Two arguments indicate a range of [START; END]. Three arguments indicate a range of [START; END] with a spacing of STEP between possible outputs. RANDOM choice will select one random item from the succeeding arguments.
trans-unit.target: RANDOM 从均匀分布中生成伪随机整数。范围（含）取决于传递的参数。没有参数指示范围为[0; 32767]。如果指定了一个参数，则内部引擎将使用该参数作为种子，以供将来调用 RANDOM 时使用,并且不会产生任何输出。有两个参数表示[START; 结束]。三个参数表示[START; END]，并在可能的输出之间使用STEP间距。 RANDOM choice 将从随后的参数中选择一个随机项。

trans-unit.source: REASON is the name of the event to trap. For example, a signal like INT or SIGINT, or the special symbol EXIT.
trans-unit.target: REASON 是要捕获的事件的名称。例如，诸如 INT 或 SIGINT 之类的信号，或特殊符号 EXIT 。

trans-unit.source: __fish_complete_directories STRING DESCRIPTION performs path completion on STRING, allowing only directories, and giving them the description DESCRIPTION.

trans-unit.source: alias is a simple wrapper for the function builtin, which creates a function wrapping a command. It has similar syntax to POSIX shell alias. For other uses, it is recommended to define a function.
and does not change the current exit status itself, but the command it runs most likely will. The exit status of the last foreground command to exit can always be accessed using the $status variable.
and does not change the current exit status itself, but the command it runs most likely will. The exit status of the last foreground command to exit can always be accessed using the $status variable.

trans-unit.source: and is used to execute a command if the previous command was successful (returned a status of 0).

and, only execute the next function if the previous succeeded (note: only some functions report success)

argv, a list of arguments to the shell or function. argv is only defined when inside a function call, or if fish was invoked with a list of arguments, like fish myscript.fish foo bar. This variable can be changed by the user.

bg sends jobs to the background, resuming them if they are stopped.

trans-unit.source: bind adds a binding for the specified key sequence to the specified command.
