trans-unit.source: block prevents events triggered by fish or the emit command from being delivered and acted upon while the block is in place.

trans-unit.source: block prevents events triggered by fish or the emit command from being delivered and acted upon while the block is in place.
break halts a currently running loop, such as a for loop or a while loop. It is usually added inside of a conditional block such as an if statement or a switch statement.
trans-unit.target: break 暂停当前​​正在运行的循环，例如for循环或while循环。通常将其添加到条件块（例如if语句或switch语句）中。

trans-unit.source: break halts a currently running loop, such as a switch, for or while loop. It is usually added inside of a conditional block such as an if block.

trans-unit.source: cancel, cancel the current commandline and replace it with a new empty one

trans-unit.target: capitalize-word ，使当前单词以大写字母开头

trans-unit.source: cd changes the current working directory.

trans-unit.source: cd, change the current directory
trans-unit.target: cd ，更改当前目录

trans-unit.source: cdh with no arguments presents a list of recently visited directories. You can then select one of the entries by letter or number. You can also press

cdh with no arguments presents a list of recently visited directories. You can then select one of the entries by letter or number. You can also press tab to use the completion pager to select an item from the list. If you give it a single argument it is equivalent to cd directory.
trans-unit.target: cdh 不带参数的cdh显示最近访问的目录的列表。然后，您可以按字母或数字选择条目之一。您也可以按Tab键使用完成寻呼机从列表中选择一个项目。如果只给它一个参数，则等效于 cd directory 。

trans-unit.source: clear clears the history file. A prompt is displayed before the history is erased asking you to confirm you really want to clear all history unless builtin history is used.
trans-unit.target: clear 清除历史记录文件。在删除历史记录之前会显示一个提示，要求您确认您是否确实要清除所有历史记录，除非使用 builtin history 。

trans-unit.source: command -q git; and command git log runs git log only if git exists.
command -s ls returns the path to the ls program.
trans-unit.target: command -s ls 返回 ls 程序的路径。

trans-unit.source: command -sq git; and command git log runs git log only if git exists.
trans-unit.target: command -sq git; and command git log 仅在 git 存在时运行 git log 。

trans-unit.source: command ls causes fish to execute the ls program, even if an ls function exists.
trans-unit.target: command ls 即使存在 ls 函数，命令ls也会使fish执行 ls 程序。

trans-unit.target: command 强制外壳程序执行程序 COMMANDNAME 并忽略具有相同名称的任何函数或内建函数。

trans-unit.target: complete-and-search ，在完成选项上调用可搜索的寻呼机（为方便起见，这也会在完成寻呼机中向后移动）

trans-unit.target: continue 跳过当前内部循环的当前迭代的其余部分，例如for循环或while循环。通常将其添加到条件块（例如if语句或switch语句）中。

trans-unit.source: continue skips the remainder of the current iteration of the current inner loop, such as a for loop or a while loop. It is usually added inside of a conditional block such as an if statement or a switch statement.

trans-unit.source: count prints the number of arguments that were passed to it, plus the number of newlines passed to it via stdin. This is usually used to find out how many elements an environment variable list contains, or how many lines there are in a text file.
count prints the number of arguments that were passed to it. This is usually used to find out how many elements an environment variable array contains.

delete-char, delete one character to the right of the cursor

trans-unit.source: delete-or-exit, deletes one character to the right of the cursor or exits the shell if the commandline is empty.

delete deletes history items. The --contains search option will be used if you don't specify a different search option. If you don't specify --exact a prompt will be displayed before any items are deleted asking you which entries are to be deleted. You can enter the word "all" to delete all matching entries. You can enter a single ID (the number in square brackets) to delete just that single entry. You can enter more than one ID separated by a space to delete multiple entries. Just press [enter] to not delete anything. Note that the interactive delete behavior is a feature of the history function. The history builtin only supports --exact --case-sensitive deletion.

delete deletes history items. Without the --prefix or --contains options, the exact match of the specified text will be deleted. If you don't specify --exact a prompt will be displayed before any items are deleted asking you which entries are to be deleted. You can enter the word "all" to delete all matching entries. You can enter a single ID (the number in square brackets) to delete just that single entry. You can enter more than one ID separated by a space to delete multiple entries. Just press [enter] to not delete anything. Note that the interactive delete behavior is a feature of the history function. The history builtin only supports --exact --case-sensitive deletion.
trans-unit.target: delete 删除历史记录项目。如果没有 --prefix 或 --contains 选项，则将删除指定文本的完全匹配项。如果您未指定 --exact ,则会在删除任何项目之前显示提示，询​​问您要删除哪些条目。您可以输入单词“ all”以删除所有匹配的条目。您可以输入一个ID（方括号中的数字）以仅删除该单个条目。您可以输入多个ID，并用空格分隔以删除多个条目。只需按[enter]即可不删除任何内容。请注意，交互式删除行为是历史功能的功能。内置的历史记录仅支持 --exact --case-sensitive 删除。

trans-unit.source: dirs does not accept any parameters.

trans-unit.target: disown (jobs -p) 从作业列表中删除所有作业，而不终止它们。

disown removes the specified job from the list of jobs. The job itself continues to exist, but fish does not keep track of it any longer.
trans-unit.target: disown 从作业列表中删除指定的作业。工作本身继续存在，但是鱼不再跟踪它。

trans-unit.target: disown 如果成功取消所有指定的作业，则disown返回0，如果遇到任何问题，则返回1。

emit emits, or fires, an event. Events are delivered to, or caught by, special functions called event handlers. The arguments are passed to the event handlers as function arguments.

trans-unit.source: exec replaces the currently running shell with a new command. On successful completion, exec never returns. exec cannot be used inside a pipeline.
trans-unit.target: exec 用新命令替换当前正在运行的shell。成功完成后， exec 永不返回。 exec 不能在管道内使用。

trans-unit.source: execute run the current commandline

trans-unit.target: exit 导致鱼退出。如果提供了 STATUS ，它将被转换为整数并用作退出代码。否则，退出代码将是最后执行的命令的退出代码。

trans-unit.source: exit causes fish to exit. If STATUS is supplied, it will be converted to an integer and used as the exit status. Otherwise, the exit status will be that of the last command executed.
exp - the base-e exponential function
trans-unit.target: exp -base-e指数函数

fac - factorial

trans-unit.target: features 列出了所有可用的功能标志。

trans-unit.source: fg brings the specified job to the foreground, resuming it if it is stopped. While a foreground job is executed, fish is suspended. If no job is specified, the last job to be used is put in the foreground. If PID is specified, the job with the specified group ID is put in the foreground.

fg brings the specified job to the foreground, resuming it if it is stopped. While a foreground job is executed, fish is suspended. If no job is specified, the last job to be used is put in the foreground. If PID is specified, the job with the specified group ID is put in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: fg 将指定的作业带到前台，如果停止，则将其恢复。在执行前台作业时，鱼将被挂起。如果未指定任何作业，则将要使用的最后一个作业放在前台。如果指定了PID，则将具有指定组ID的作业放在前台。

trans-unit.source: fg will put the last job in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: fg 将把最后的工作放在前台。

trans-unit.source: filename prints the filename of the currently running script. Also current-filename, -f or --current-filename.
trans-unit.target: filename 打印当前正在运行的脚本的文件名。还有 current-filename ， -f 或 --current-filename 。

trans-unit.target: firefox &; disown 将在后台启动Firefox Web浏览器并将其从作业列表中删除，这意味着在关闭fish进程后将不会关闭它。

trans-unit.source: fish-path prints the absolute path to the currently executing instance of fish.
trans-unit.target: fish-path 打印到当前正在执行的fish实例的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: fish also has man pages for its commands. For example, man set will show the documentation for set as a man page.
trans-unit.target: fish 也有其命令手册页。例如， man set 将显示在文档 set 作为一个男人页面。

trans-unit.source: fish also sends additional information to the user through the values of certain environment variables. The user cannot change the values of most of these variables.
trans-unit.target: fish 还通过某些环境变量的值向用户发送其他信息。用户无法更改大多数这些变量的值。

trans-unit.source: fish automatically creates arrays from all environment variables whose name ends in PATH, by splitting them on colons. Other variables are not automatically split.
trans-unit.target: fish 通过将所有环境变量的名称以PATH开头（通过在冒号上拆分）来自动创建数组。其他变量不会自动拆分。

trans-unit.source: fish automatically creates lists from all environment variables whose name ends in PATH, by splitting them on colons. Other variables are not automatically split.
fish can also complete many commands, like git branches:
trans-unit.target: fish 还可以完成许多命令，例如git branch：

trans-unit.source: fish comes with a rich set of tab completions, that work "out of the box."
trans-unit.target: fish 带有丰富的制表符补全，可以“即开即用”地工作。

trans-unit.source: fish has a special syntax to support specifying switches accepted by a command. The switches -s, -l and -o are used to specify a short switch (single character, such as -l), a gnu style long switch (such as '--color') and an old-style long switch (like '-shuffle'), respectively. trans-unit.source: fish has an extensive help system. Use the help command to obtain help on a specific subject or command. For instance, writing help syntax displays the syntax section of this documentation.
fish has an extensive help system. Use the help command to obtain help on a specific subject or command. For instance, writing help syntax displays the syntax section of this documentation.
trans-unit.target: fish 有广泛的帮助系统。使用 help 命令可获得有关特定主题或命令的帮助。例如，编写 help syntax 显示本文档的语法部分。

trans-unit.source: fish has excellent help and man pages. Run help to open help in a web browser, and man to open it in a man page. You can also ask for help with a specific command, for example, help set to open in a web browser, or man set to see it in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: fish 具有出色的帮助和手册页。运行 help 在Web浏览器中打开的帮助， man 在男人页面打开它。您还可以通过特定命令寻求帮助，例如，在Web浏览器中打开的 help set ，或在终端中查看该帮助的 man set 。

trans-unit.source: fish interprets the command line as it is typed and uses syntax highlighting to provide feedback to the user. The most important feedback is the detection of potential errors. By default, errors are marked red.
trans-unit.target: fish 在键入命令行时对其进行解释，并使用语法突出显示功能向用户提供反馈。最重要的反馈是潜在错误的检测。默认情况下，错误标记为红色。

trans-unit.source: fish is a command-line shell written mainly with interactive use in mind. The full manual is available in HTML by using the help command from inside fish.
trans-unit.target: fish 是主要出于交互用途而编写的命令行外壳。完整的手册可通过使用fish内部的help命令以HTML格式获得。

trans-unit.source: fish is a command-line shell written mainly with interactive use in mind. This page briefly describes the options for invoking fish. The full manual is available in HTML by using the help command from inside fish, and in the fish-doc(1) man page. The tutorial is available as HTML via help tutorial or in fish-tutorial(1).

fish is a fully-equipped command line shell (like bash or zsh) that is smart and user-friendly. fish supports powerful features like syntax highlighting, autosuggestions, and tab completions that just work, with nothing to learn or configure.
trans-unit.target: fish 是功能齐全的命令行外壳程序（例如bash或zsh），既智能又友好。 fish 支持强大的功能，例如语法突出显示，自动建议和仅需工作的制表符补全，无需学习或配置。

trans-unit.source: fish marks functions that have been created by alias by including the command used to create them in the function description. You can list alias-created functions by running alias without arguments. They must be erased using functions -e.
trans-unit.target: fish 已创建用标记功能 alias 通过包括使用在功能描述来创建它们的命令。您可以通过运行不带参数的 alias 来列出 alias 创建的函数。必须使用 functions -e 擦除它们。

trans-unit.source: fish provides a large number of program specific completions. Most of these completions are simple options like the -l option for ls, but some are more advanced. The latter include:
trans-unit.target: fish 提供了大量程序特定的完成。这些补全中的大多数都是简单的选项，例如 ls 的 -l 选项，但有些更高级。后者包括：

trans-unit.source: fish runs commands like other shells: you type a command, followed by its arguments. Spaces are separators:
trans-unit.target: fish 与其他shell一样运行命令：您键入命令，后跟其参数。空格是分隔符：

trans-unit.source: fish ships with a default version of this function that displays the function name and line number of the current execution context.
trans-unit.target: fish 附带此函数的默认版本，该版本显示当前执行上下文的函数名称和行号。

trans-unit.source: fish ships with a large number of builtin commands, shellscript functions and external commands. These are all described below.
trans-unit.target: fish 带有大量内置命令，shellscript函数和外部命令。这些都在下面描述。

trans-unit.source: fish ships with a number of example prompts that can be chosen with the fish_config command.
trans-unit.target: fish 附带了许多示例提示，可以使用 fish_config 命令进行选择。

trans-unit.source: fish ships with several functions that are very useful when writing command specific completions. Most of these functions name begins with the string '__fish_'. Such functions are internal to fish and their name and interface may change in future fish versions. Still, some of them may be very useful when writing completions. A few of these functions are described here. Be aware that they may be removed or changed in future versions of fish.
trans-unit.target: fish 附带多种功能写命令的具体落成时是非常有用的。这些函数名称大多数以字符串 __fish_ 开头。此类功能是 fish 的内部功能，它们的名称和接口可能会在将来的fish版本中更改。但是，其中一些在编写完成时可能非常有用。这里描述了其中一些功能。请注意，在以后的鱼类版本中可能会删除或更改它们。

trans-unit.source: fish starts by executing commands in ~/.config/fish/config.fish. You can create it if it does not exist.
trans-unit.target: fish 通过在 ~/.config/fish/config.fish 执行命令开始。如果它不存在，则可以创建它。

trans-unit.source: fish suggests commands as you type, and shows the suggestion to the right of the cursor, in gray. For example
fish suggests commands as you type, and shows the suggestion to the right of the cursor, in gray. For example:
trans-unit.target: fish 在键入时会建议命令，并在光标右侧以灰色显示该建议。例如：

trans-unit.source: fish supports the familiar wildcard *. To list all JPEG files:
trans-unit.target: fish 支持熟悉的通配符 * 。列出所有JPEG文件：

trans-unit.source: fish uses an Emacs style kill ring for copy and paste functionality. Use Control-K to cut from the current cursor position to the end of the line. The string that is cut (a.k.a. killed) is inserted into a linked list of kills, called the kill ring. To paste the latest value from the kill ring use Control-Y. After pasting, use Alt-Y to rotate to the previous kill.
trans-unit.target: fish 使用Emacs样式的杀死环来实现复制和粘贴功能。使用Control - K从当前光标位置剪切到行尾。被剪切（又称杀死）的字符串将插入到杀死链接列表中，称为杀死环。要从终止环粘贴最新值，请使用Control - Y。粘贴后，使用Alt - Y旋转到上一个杀死对象。

fish uses parentheses for subcommands. For example:

trans-unit.source: fish will underline valid file paths as you type them
fish will underline valid file paths as you type them:
trans-unit.target: fish 在键入时将在有效文件路径下划线：

trans-unit.source: fish_ambiguous_width controls the computed width of ambiguous East Asian characters. This should be set to 1 if your terminal emulator renders these characters as single-width (typical), or 2 if double-width.
trans-unit.target: fish_ambiguous_width 控制不明确的东亚字符的计算宽度。如果您的终端仿真器将这些字符呈现为单角（典型值），则应将其设置为1；如果是双角，则应将其设置为2。

trans-unit.source: fish_ambiguous_width controls the computed width of ambiguous-width characters. This should be set to 1 if your terminal emulator renders these characters as single-width (typical), or 2 if double-width.
fish_cancel, which is emitted when a commandline is cleared (used for terminal-shell integration).
fish_color_autosuggestion, the color used for autosuggestions
trans-unit.target: fish_color_autosuggestion ，用于自动建议的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_cancel, the color for the '^C' indicator on a canceled command
trans-unit.target: fish_color_cancel ，已取消命令上“ ^ C”指示符的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_command, the color for commands
trans-unit.target: fish_color_command ，命令的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_comment, the color used for code comments
trans-unit.target: fish_color_comment ，用于代码注释的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_cwd, the color used for the current working directory in the default prompt
trans-unit.target: fish_color_cwd ，默认提示符下用于当前工作目录的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_end, the color for process separators like ';' and '&'
trans-unit.target: fish_color_end ，过程分隔符（如“;”）的颜色 和“＆”

trans-unit.target: fish_color_error ，用于突出显示潜在错误的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_escape, the color used to highlight character escapes like '\n' and '\x70'
trans-unit.target: fish_color_escape ，用于突出显示字符转义符的颜色，例如'\ n'和'\ x70'

trans-unit.source: fish_color_host, the color used to print the current host system in some of fish default prompts
trans-unit.target: fish_color_host ，在某些fish默认提示中用于打印当前主机系统的颜色

fish_color_match, the color used to highlight matching parenthesis
trans-unit.target: fish_color_match ，用于突出显示匹配括号的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_normal, the default color
trans-unit.target: fish_color_normal ，默认颜色

trans-unit.target: fish_color_operator ，参数扩展运算符（如“ *”和“〜”）的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_param, the color for regular command parameters
trans-unit.target: fish_color_param ，常规命令参数的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_quote, the color for quoted blocks of text
trans-unit.target: fish_color_quote ，带引号的文本块的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_redirection, the color for IO redirections
trans-unit.target: fish_color_redirection ，IO重定向的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_color_search_match, used to highlight history search matches and the selected pager item (must be a background)
trans-unit.target: fish_color_search_match ，用于突出显示历史记录搜索匹配项和选定的寻呼机项（必须是背景）

trans-unit.source: fish_color_selection, the color used when selecting text (in vi visual mode)
trans-unit.target: fish_color_selection ，选择文本时使用的颜色（在视觉模式下）

trans-unit.source: fish_color_user, the color used to print the current username in some of fish default prompts
trans-unit.target: fish_color_user ，这是鱼的一些默认提示中用于打印当前用户名的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_command_not_found, which is emitted whenever a command lookup failed.
trans-unit.target: fish_command_not_found ，每当命令查找失败时发出。

trans-unit.source: fish_config opens a new web browser window and allows you to configure certain fish settings.
trans-unit.target: fish_config 打开一个新的Web浏览器窗口，并允许您配置某些fish设置。

trans-unit.source: fish_config optionally accepts name of the initial configuration tab. For e.g. fish_config history will start configuration interface with history tab.
trans-unit.target: fish_config 可以选择接受初始配置选项卡的名称。例如， fish_config history 将通过“历史记录”选项卡启动配置界面。

trans-unit.source: fish_config starts a local web server and then opens a web browser window; when you have finished, close the browser window and then press the Enter key to terminate the configuration session.
trans-unit.target: fish_config 启动本地Web服务器，然后打开Web浏览器窗口；完成后，关闭浏览器窗口，然后按Enter键以终止配置会话。

trans-unit.source: fish_config starts the web-based configuration interface.
trans-unit.target: fish_config 启动基于Web的配置界面。

trans-unit.source: fish_emoji_width controls the computed width of certain characters, in particular emoji, whose rendered width changed in Unicode 9 and hence varies across terminal emulators. This should be set to 2 if your terminal emulator supports Unicode >= 9 and renders them double-width, and 1 otherwise. Set this only if you see graphical glitching when printing emoji, typically it will be automatically detected.

fish_emoji_width controls the computed width of certain characters, in particular emoji, whose rendered width varies across terminal emulators. This should be set to 1 if your terminal emulator renders emoji single-width, or 2 if double-width. Set this only if you see graphical glitching when printing emoji.
trans-unit.target: fish_emoji_width 控制某些字符（尤其是表情符号）的计算宽度，这些字符的呈现宽度在终端仿真器中有所不同。如果您的终端模拟器将表情符号呈现为单角，则应将其设置为1；如果是双角，则应将其设置为2。仅当在打印表情符号时看到图形故障时才进行设置。

trans-unit.source: fish_escape_delay_ms overrides the default timeout of 300ms (default key bindings) or 10ms (vi key bindings) after seeing an escape character before giving up on matching a key binding. See the documentation for the bind builtin command. This delay facilitates using escape as a meta key.
trans-unit.target: fish_escape_delay_ms 在看到转义字符后放弃匹配按键绑定之前会覆盖默认的300ms（默认按键绑定）或10ms（vi按键绑定）的默认超时。请参阅bind Builtin命令的文档。此延迟有助于将转义用作元密钥。

trans-unit.source: fish_escape_delay_ms overrides the default timeout of 30ms after seeing an escape character before giving up on matching a key binding. This is explained in the documentation for the bind builtin command. This delay facilitates using escape as a meta key.
fish_exit is emitted right before fish exits.
trans-unit.target: fish_exit 会在鱼退出前发出。

trans-unit.source: fish_greeting, the greeting message printed on startup.
trans-unit.target: fish_greeting ，启动时打印的问候消息。

trans-unit.source: fish_history, the current history session name. If set, all subsequent commands within an interactive fish session will be logged to a separate file identified by the value of the variable. If unset, or set to default, the default session name "fish" is used. If set to an empty string, history is not saved to disk (but is still available within the interactive session).
trans-unit.target: fish_history ，当前历史记录会话名称。如果设置，则交互式fish会话中的所有后续命令都将记录到由变量值标识的单独文件中。如果未设置或设置为 default ，则使用默认会话名称“ fish”。如果设置为空字符串，则历史记录不会保存到磁盘（但在交互式会话中仍然可用）。

trans-unit.source: fish_indent is used to indent a piece of fish code. fish_indent reads commands from standard input and outputs them to standard output or a specified file.
trans-unit.target: fish_indent 用于缩进一条鱼代码。 fish_indent 从标准输入读取命令，并将其输出到标准输出或指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: fish_indent is used to indent a piece of fish code. fish_indent reads commands from standard input or the given filenames and outputs them to standard output or a specified file (if -w is given).
fish_key_reader intentionally disables handling of many signals. To terminate fish_key_reader in --continuous mode do:
trans-unit.target: fish_key_reader 故意禁用许多信号的处理。要以 --continuous 模式终止 fish_key_reader ，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: fish_key_reader is used to study input received from the terminal and can help with key binds. The program is interactive and works on standard input. Individual characters themselves and their hexadecimal values are displayed.
trans-unit.target: fish_key_reader 用于研究从终端接收的输入，并可以帮助进行键绑定。该程序是交互式的，可在标准输入上运行。显示各个字符本身及其十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: fish_pager_color_background, the background color of a line
fish_pager_color_completion, the color of the completion itself
trans-unit.target: fish_pager_color_completion ，完成本身的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_pager_color_progress, the color of the progress bar at the bottom left corner
trans-unit.target: fish_pager_color_progress ，左下角进度条的颜色

trans-unit.source: fish_pager_color_secondary, the background color of the every second completion
trans-unit.target: fish_pager_color_secondary ，每第二次完成的背景色

trans-unit.source: fish_pager_color_secondary_ prefix, fish_pager_color_prefix of every second unselected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_prefix
fish_pager_color_secondary_background, fish_pager_color_background of every second unselected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_background
fish_pager_color_secondary_completion, fish_pager_color_completion of every second unselected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_completion
fish_pager_color_secondary_description, fish_pager_color_description of every second unselected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_description
fish_pager_color_selected_background, fish_pager_color_background of the selected completion. Defaults to fish_color_search_match
fish_pager_color_selected_completion, fish_pager_color_completion of the selected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_completion
fish_pager_color_selected_description, fish_pager_color_description of the selected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_description
fish_pager_color_selected_prefix, fish_pager_color_prefix of the selected completion. Defaults to fish_pager_color_prefix
fish_postexec, which is emitted right after executing an interactive command. The commandline is passed as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: fish_postexec ，它在执行交互式命令后立即发出。命令行作为第一个参数传递。

trans-unit.source: fish_preexec, which is emitted right before executing an interactive command. The commandline is passed as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: fish_preexec ，它是在执行交互式命令之前发出的。命令行作为第一个参数传递。

trans-unit.source: fish_prompt, which is emitted whenever a new fish prompt is about to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: fish_prompt ，每当要显示新的鱼提示时都会发出。

trans-unit.source: fish_right_prompt is similar to fish_prompt, except that it appears on the right side of the terminal window.
trans-unit.target: fish_right_prompt 类似于 fish_prompt ，不同之处在于它出现在终端窗口的右侧。

trans-unit.source: fish_trace, if set and not empty, will cause fish to print commands before they execute, similar to set -x in bash. The trace is printed to the path given by the --debug-output option to fish (stderr by default).
fish_update_completions parses manual pages installed on the system, and attempts to create completion files in the fish configuration directory.
trans-unit.target: fish_update_completions 解析系统上安装的手册页，并尝试在 fish 配置目录中创建完成文件。

trans-unit.source: fish_user_paths, a list of directories that are prepended to PATH. This can be a universal variable.
fish_user_paths, an array of directories that are prepended to PATH. This can be a universal variable.
trans-unit.target: fish_user_paths ，是 PATH 前面的目录数组。这可以是一个通用变量。

trans-unit.source: fish_vi_mode enters a vi-like command editing mode. To always start in vi mode, add fish_vi_mode to your config.fish file.
trans-unit.target: fish_vi_mode 进入类似于vi的命令编辑模式。要始终以vi模式启动，请将 fish_vi_mode 添加到 config.fish 文件中。

trans-unit.source: for is a loop construct. It will perform the commands specified by COMMANDS multiple times. On each iteration, the local variable specified by VARNAME is assigned a new value from VALUES. If VALUES is empty, COMMANDS will not be executed at all. The VARNAME is visible when the loop terminates and will contain the last value assigned to it. If VARNAME does not already exist it will be set in the local scope. For our purposes if the for block is inside a function there must be a local variable with the same name. If the for block is not nested inside a function then global and universal variables of the same name will be used if they exist.
trans-unit.target: for 是一个循环构造。它将多次执行 COMMANDS 指定的命令。在每次迭代中，通过指定的本地变量 VARNAME 分配从一个新值 VALUES 。如果 VALUES 为空，将完全不执行 COMMANDS 。该 VARNAME 是可见的，当循环终止，并将包含分配给它的最后一个值。如果 VARNAME 还不存在，它将在本地范围内设置。就我们而言，如果 for 块位于函数内部，则必须有一个具有相同名称的局部变量。如果 for 块不嵌套在函数内，则如果存在相同名称的全局变量和通用变量，则将使用它们。

trans-unit.source: force-repaint reexecute the prompt functions without coalescing
forward-bigword, move one whitespace-delimited word to the right
trans-unit.target: forward-bigword ，将一个空格分隔的单词向右移动

trans-unit.source: forward-char, move one character to the right
trans-unit.target: forward-char ，向右移动一个字符

trans-unit.source: forward-jump-till and backward-jump-till, jump to right before the next occurence
forward-jump and backward-jump, read another character and jump to its next occurence after/before the cursor
forward-word, move one word to the right
trans-unit.target: forward-word ，向右移动一个词

trans-unit.source: funced provides an interface to edit the definition of the function NAME.
trans-unit.target: funced 提供了一个界面来编辑功能 NAME 的定义。

trans-unit.source: funcsave saves the current definition of a function to a file in the fish configuration directory. This function will be automatically loaded by current and future fish sessions. This can be useful if you have interactively created a new function and wish to save it for later use.
trans-unit.target: funcsave 将函数的当前定义保存到fish配置目录中的文件中。当前和将来的鱼类会议将自动加载此功能。如果您已经交互式创建了一个新功能并希望将其保存以备后用，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: function creates a new function NAME with the body BODY.
trans-unit.target: function 使用主体 BODY 创建一个新函数 NAME 。

trans-unit.source: function prints the name of the currently called function if able, when missing displays "Not a function" (or equivalent translated string). Also current-function, -u or --current-function.
trans-unit.target: function 如果可以，函数将打印当前调用函数的名称，如果缺少，则会显示“不是函数”（或等效的翻译字符串）。还有 current-function ， -u 或 --current-function 。

trans-unit.source: functions prints or erases functions.
trans-unit.target: functions 打印或删除功能。

trans-unit.source: h-help means that only --help is valid. The flag is a boolean and can be used more than once. If the long flag is used then _flag_h and _flag_help will be set to the count of how many times the long flag was seen.
trans-unit.target: h-help 表示仅 --help 有效。该标志是一个布尔值，可以多次使用。如果使用了long标志，则 _flag_h 和 _flag_help 将设置为看到long标志的次数的计数。

trans-unit.source: h/help means that both -h and --help are valid. The flag is a boolean and can be used more than once. If either flag is used then _flag_h and _flag_help will be set to the count of how many times either flag was seen.
trans-unit.target: h/help 表示 -h 和 --help 均有效。该标志是一个布尔值，可以多次使用。如果使用任何一个标志，则 _flag_h 和 _flag_help 将被设置为该标志被看到多少次的计数。

trans-unit.source: help fg shows the documentation for the fg builtin.
trans-unit.target: help fg 显示了文档 fg 内置。

trans-unit.source: help displays the fish help documentation.
trans-unit.target: help 显示fish帮助文档。

trans-unit.source: history-prefix-search-backward, search the history for the previous prefix match
history-prefix-search-forward, search the history for the next prefix match
history-search-backward, search the history for the previous match
trans-unit.target: history-search-backward ，在历史记录中搜索上一个匹配项

trans-unit.source: history-search-forward, search the history for the next match
trans-unit.target: history-search-forward ，在历史记录中搜索下一场比赛

trans-unit.source: history-token-search-backward, search the history for the previous matching argument
history-token-search-forward, search the history for the next matching argument
history is used to search, delete, and otherwise manipulate the history of interactive commands.
history is used to search, delete, and otherwise manipulate the history of interactive commands.
trans-unit.target: history 用于搜索，删除和以其他方式操纵交互式命令的历史记录。

trans-unit.source: history, a list containing the last commands that were entered.
history, an array containing the last commands that were entered.
trans-unit.target: history ，一个包含最后输入命令的数组。

trans-unit.source: hostname, the machine's hostname.
trans-unit.target: hostname ，机器的主机名。

trans-unit.source: if will execute the command CONDITION. If the condition's exit status is 0, the commands COMMANDS_TRUE will execute. If it is not 0 and else is given, COMMANDS_FALSE will be executed.
trans-unit.target: if 执行命令 CONDITION 。如果条件的退出状态为0，将执行命令 COMMANDS_TRUE 。如果它不为0且给出 else 值，则将执行 COMMANDS_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: if will execute the command CONDITION. If the condition's exit status is 0, the commands COMMANDS_TRUE will execute. If the exit status is not 0 and else is given, COMMANDS_FALSE will be executed.
if will execute the command CONDITION. If the condition's exit status is 0, the commands COMMANDS_TRUE will execute. If the exit status is not 0 and else is given, COMMANDS_FALSE will be executed.
trans-unit.target: if 执行命令 CONDITION 。如果条件的退出状态为0，将执行命令 COMMANDS_TRUE 。如果退出状态不为0，并且给出了 else 状态，则将执行 COMMANDS_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: is-block returns 0 if fish is currently executing a block of code. Also -b or --is-block.
trans-unit.target: is-block 如果fish当前正在执行代码块，则is-block返回0。也 -b 或 --is-block 。

trans-unit.source: is-breakpoint returns 0 if fish is currently showing a prompt in the context of a breakpoint command. See also the fish_breakpoint_prompt function.
trans-unit.target: is-breakpoint 如果fish当前在 breakpoint 命令的上下文中显示提示，则is-breakpoint返回0 。另请参见 fish_breakpoint_prompt 函数。

trans-unit.source: is-command-sub returns 0 if fish is currently executing a command substitution. Also -c or --is-command-substitution.
trans-unit.target: is-command-sub 如果fish当前正在执行命令替换，则is-command-sub返回0。也可以使用 -c 或 --is-command-substitution 。

trans-unit.source: is-command-substitution returns 0 if fish is currently executing a command substitution. Also -c or --is-command-substitution.
is-full-job-control returns 0 if full job control is enabled. Also --is-full-job-control (no short flag).
trans-unit.target: is-full-job-control 如果启用了完全作业控制，则is-full-job-control返回0。同样 --is-full-job-control （无短标志）。

trans-unit.source: is-interactive-job-control returns 0 if interactive job control is enabled. Also, --is-interactive-job-control (no short flag).
trans-unit.target: is-interactive-job-control 如果启用了交互式作业控制，则is-interactive-job-control返回0。此外，-- --is-interactive-job-control （无短标志）。

trans-unit.source: is-interactive returns 0 if fish is interactive - that is, connected to a keyboard. Also -i or --is-interactive.
trans-unit.target: is-interactive 如果fish是交互式的，即连接到键盘，则is-interactive返回0。也 -i 或 --is-interactive 。

trans-unit.source: is-login returns 0 if fish is a login shell - that is, if fish should perform login tasks such as setting up the PATH. Also -l or --is-login.
trans-unit.target: is-login 如果fish是登录外壳，则is-login返回0，也就是说，fish应该执行登录任务（例如设置PATH）。也 -l 或 --is-login 。

trans-unit.source: is-no-job-control returns 0 if no job control is enabled. Also --is-no-job-control (no short flag).
trans-unit.target: is-no-job-control 如果未启用任何作业控制，则is-no-job-control返回0。也 --is-no-job-control （没有短标志）。

trans-unit.source: isatty tests if a file descriptor is a terminal (as opposed to a file). The name is derived from the system call of the same name, which for historical reasons refers to a teletypewriter (TTY).
isatty tests if a file descriptor is a tty.
trans-unit.target: isatty 测试文件描述符是否为tty。

trans-unit.source: job-control CONTROL-TYPE sets the job control type, which can be none, full, or interactive. Also -j CONTROL-TYPE or --job-control=CONTROL-TYPE.
trans-unit.target: job-control CONTROL-TYPE 设置作业控制类型，可以是 none ， full 或 interactive 。同样 -j CONTROL-TYPE 或 --job-control=CONTROL-TYPE 。

trans-unit.source: jobs outputs a summary of the current jobs.
trans-unit.target: jobs 输出当前作业的摘要。

trans-unit.source: jobs prints a list of the currently running jobs and their status.
jobs prints a list of the currently running jobs and their status.
trans-unit.target: jobs 打印当前正在运行的作业及其状态的列表。

trans-unit.source: kill-bigword, move the next whitespace-delimited word to the killring
trans-unit.target: kill-bigword ，将下一个空格分隔的单词移至killring

trans-unit.source: kill-line, move everything from the cursor to the end of the line to the killring
trans-unit.target: kill-line ，将所有内容从光标移动到该行的末尾再到killring

trans-unit.source: kill-selection, move the selected text to the killring
trans-unit.target: kill-selection ，将选定的文本移至killring

trans-unit.source: kill-whole-line, move the line to the killring
trans-unit.target: kill-whole-line ，将线移至杀手

trans-unit.source: kill-word, move the next word to the killring
trans-unit.target: kill-word ，将下一个单词移至killring

trans-unit.source: less, list the contents of files
trans-unit.target: less ，列出文件内容

trans-unit.source: line-number prints the line number of the currently running script. Also current-line-number, -n or --current-line-number.
trans-unit.target: line-number 打印当前正在运行的脚本的行号。还有 current-line-number ， -n 或 --current-line-number 。

trans-unit.source: log or log10 - the base-10 logarithm
trans-unit.target: log 或 log10 -以10为底的对数

trans-unit.source: ls, list files and directories
trans-unit.target: ls ，列出文件和目录

trans-unit.source: man is a command for displaying a manual page on a given topic. The man command takes the name of the manual page to display as an argument. There are manual pages for almost every command on most computers. There are also manual pages for many other things, such as system libraries and important files.
trans-unit.target: man 是用于显示给定主题的手册页的命令。man命令使用手册页的名称作为参数显示。大多数计算机上几乎所有命令都有手册页。还有许多其他内容的手册页，例如系统库和重要文件。

trans-unit.source: man, display a manual page on the screen
trans-unit.target: man ，在屏幕上显示手册页

trans-unit.source: math "sin(pi)" outputs 0.
trans-unit.target: math "sin(pi)" 输出 0 。
